00034 static int kHashSizes[] = {
00035     1, 3, 5, 11, 17, 37, 67, 131, 257, 521, 1031, 2053, 4099, 8209, 
00036     16411, 32771, 65537, 131101, 262147, 524309, 1048583, 2097169,

00040 typedef struct _EHEntry EHEntry;
00041 struct _EHEntry {
00042     EHEntry *next;
00043     void *key;
00044 };
00045 typedef struct _EHash {
00046     EHEntry **buckets;
00047     int numEntries, curSize, curSizeIdx;
00048 
00049     CCGAllocatorIFC allocatorIFC;
00050     CCGAllocatorHDL allocator;
00051 } EHash;
00052 
00053 #define EHASH_alloc(eh, nb)     ((eh)->allocatorIFC.alloc((eh)->allocator, nb))
00054 #define EHASH_free(eh, ptr)     ((eh)->allocatorIFC.free((eh)->allocator, ptr))
00055 
00056 #define EHASH_hash(eh, item)    (((uintptr_t) (item)) % ((unsigned int) (eh)->curSize))
00057 
00058 static void ccgSubSurf__sync(CCGSubSurf *ss);

00061 static EHash *_ehash_new(int estimatedNumEntries, CCGAllocatorIFC *allocatorIFC, CCGAllocatorHDL allocator)
00062 {
00063     EHash *eh = allocatorIFC->alloc(allocator, sizeof(*eh));
00064     eh->allocatorIFC = *allocatorIFC;
00065     eh->allocator = allocator;
00066     eh->numEntries = 0;
00067     eh->curSizeIdx = 0;
00068     while (kHashSizes[eh->curSizeIdx] < estimatedNumEntries)
00069         eh->curSizeIdx++;
00070     eh->curSize = kHashSizes[eh->curSizeIdx];
00071     eh->buckets = EHASH_alloc(eh, eh->curSize * sizeof(*eh->buckets));
00072     memset(eh->buckets, 0, eh->curSize * sizeof(*eh->buckets));
00073 
00074     return eh;
00075 }
00076 typedef void (*EHEntryFreeFP)(EHEntry *, void *);
00077 static void _ehash_free(EHash *eh, EHEntryFreeFP freeEntry, void *userData)
00078 {
00079     int numBuckets = eh->curSize;
00080 
00081     while (numBuckets--) {
00082         EHEntry *entry = eh->buckets[numBuckets];
00083 
00084         while (entry) {
00085             EHEntry *next = entry->next;
00086 
00087             freeEntry(entry, userData);
00088 
00089             entry = next;
00090         }
00091     }
00092 
00093     EHASH_free(eh, eh->buckets);
00094     EHASH_free(eh, eh);
00095 }
00096 
00097 static void _ehash_insert(EHash *eh, EHEntry *entry)
00098 {
00099     int numBuckets = eh->curSize;
00100     int hash = EHASH_hash(eh, entry->key);
00101     entry->next = eh->buckets[hash];
00102     eh->buckets[hash] = entry;
00103     eh->numEntries++;
00104 
00105     if (eh->numEntries > (numBuckets * 3)) {
00106         EHEntry **oldBuckets = eh->buckets;
00107         eh->curSize = kHashSizes[++eh->curSizeIdx];
00108         
00109         eh->buckets = EHASH_alloc(eh, eh->curSize * sizeof(*eh->buckets));
00110         memset(eh->buckets, 0, eh->curSize * sizeof(*eh->buckets));
00111 
00112         while (numBuckets--) {
00113             for (entry = oldBuckets[numBuckets]; entry; ) {
00114                 EHEntry *next = entry->next;
00115                 
00116                 hash = EHASH_hash(eh, entry->key);
00117                 entry->next = eh->buckets[hash];
00118                 eh->buckets[hash] = entry;
00119                 
00120                 entry = next;
00121             }
00122         }
00123 
00124         EHASH_free(eh, oldBuckets);
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 static void *_ehash_lookupWithPrev(EHash *eh, void *key, void ***prevp_r)
00129 {
00130     int hash = EHASH_hash(eh, key);
00131     void **prevp = (void **) &eh->buckets[hash];
00132     EHEntry *entry;
00133     
00134     for (; (entry = *prevp); prevp = (void **) &entry->next) {
00135         if (entry->key == key) {
00136             *prevp_r = (void **) prevp;
00137             return entry;
00138         }
00139     }
00140     
00141     return NULL;
00142 }
00143 
00144 static void *_ehash_lookup(EHash *eh, void *key)
00145 {
00146     int hash = EHASH_hash(eh, key);
00147     EHEntry *entry;
00148     
00149     for (entry = eh->buckets[hash]; entry; entry = entry->next)
00150         if (entry->key == key)
00151             break;
00152     
00153     return entry;
00154 }

00158 typedef struct _EHashIterator {
00159     EHash *eh;
00160     int curBucket;
00161     EHEntry *curEntry;
00162 } EHashIterator;
00163 
00164 static EHashIterator *_ehashIterator_new(EHash *eh)
00165 {
00166     EHashIterator *ehi = EHASH_alloc(eh, sizeof(*ehi));
00167     ehi->eh = eh;
00168     ehi->curEntry = NULL;
00169     ehi->curBucket = -1;
00170     while (!ehi->curEntry) {
00171         ehi->curBucket++;
00172         if (ehi->curBucket == ehi->eh->curSize)
00173             break;
00174         ehi->curEntry = ehi->eh->buckets[ehi->curBucket];
00175     }
00176     return ehi;
00177 }
00178 static void _ehashIterator_free(EHashIterator *ehi)
00179 {
00180     EHASH_free(ehi->eh, ehi);
00181 }
00182 
00183 static void *_ehashIterator_getCurrent(EHashIterator *ehi)
00184 {
00185     return ehi->curEntry;
00186 }
00187 
00188 static void _ehashIterator_next(EHashIterator *ehi)
00189 {
00190     if (ehi->curEntry) {
00191         ehi->curEntry = ehi->curEntry->next;
00192         while (!ehi->curEntry) {
00193             ehi->curBucket++;
00194             if (ehi->curBucket == ehi->eh->curSize)
00195                 break;
00196             ehi->curEntry = ehi->eh->buckets[ehi->curBucket];
00197         }
00198     }
00199 }
00200 static int _ehashIterator_isStopped(EHashIterator *ehi)
00201 {
00202     return !ehi->curEntry;
00203 }

00234 int ccg_gridsize(int level)
00235 {
00236     BLI_assert(level > 0);
00237     BLI_assert(level <= 31);
00238          
00239     return (1 << (level - 1)) + 1;
00240 }
00241 
00242 int ccg_factor(int low_level, int high_level)
00243 {
00244     BLI_assert(low_level > 0 && high_level > 0);
00245     BLI_assert(low_level <= high_level);
00246 
00247     return 1 << (high_level - low_level);
00248 }
00249 
00250 static int ccg_edgesize(int level)
00251 {
00252     BLI_assert(level > 0);
00253     BLI_assert(level <= 30);
00254     
00255     return 1 + (1 << level);
00256 }
00257 
00258 static int ccg_spacing(int high_level, int low_level)
00259 {
00260     BLI_assert(high_level > 0 && low_level > 0);
00261     BLI_assert(high_level >= low_level);
00262     BLI_assert((high_level - low_level) <= 30);
00263 
00264     return 1 << (high_level - low_level);
00265 }
00266 
00267 static int ccg_edgebase(int level)
00268 {
00269     BLI_assert(level > 0);
00270     BLI_assert(level <= 30);
00271 
00272     return level + (1 << level) - 1;
00273 }

00279     return a[0] == b[0] && a[1] == b[1] && a[2] == b[2];

00281 #define VertDataZero(av)     { float *_a = (float *)av; _a[0] = _a[1] = _a[2] = 0.0f; }
00282 #define VertDataCopy(av, bv) { float *_a = (float *)av, *_b = (float *) bv; _a[0]  = _b[0]; _a[1]  = _b[1]; _a[2]  = _b[2]; }
00283 #define VertDataAdd(av, bv)  { float *_a = (float *)av, *_b = (float *) bv; _a[0] += _b[0]; _a[1] += _b[1]; _a[2] += _b[2]; }
00284 #define VertDataSub(av, bv)  { float *_a = (float *)av, *_b = (float *) bv; _a[0] -= _b[0]; _a[1] -= _b[1]; _a[2] -= _b[2]; }
00285 #define VertDataMulN(av, n)  { float *_a = (float *)av; float _n = n; _a[0] *= _n; _a[1] *= _n; _a[2] *= _n; }
00286 #define VertDataAvg4(tv, av, bv, cv, dv) \
00287     { \
00288         float *_t = (float *) tv, *_a = (float *) av, *_b = (float *) bv, *_c = (float *) cv, *_d = (float *) dv; \
00289         _t[0] = (_a[0] + _b[0] + _c[0] + _d[0]) * 0.25f; \

00291         _t[2] = (_a[2] + _b[2] + _c[2] + _d[2]) * 0.25f; \
00292     }

00295 #define NormAdd(av, bv)  { float *_a = (float *) av, *_b = (float *) bv; _a[0] += _b[0]; _a[1] += _b[1]; _a[2] += _b[2]; }

00427 static CCGVert *_vert_new(CCGVertHDL vHDL, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00428 {
00429     int num_vert_data = ss->subdivLevels + 1;
00430     CCGVert *v = CCGSUBSURF_alloc(ss,
00431                                   sizeof(CCGVert) +
00432                                   ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize * num_vert_data +
00433                                   ss->meshIFC.vertUserSize);
00434     byte *userData;
00435 
00436     v->vHDL = vHDL;
00437     v->edges = NULL;
00438     v->faces = NULL;
00439     v->numEdges = v->numFaces = 0;
00440     v->flags = 0;
00441 
00442     userData = ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v);
00443     memset(userData, 0, ss->meshIFC.vertUserSize);
00444     if (ss->useAgeCounts) *((int *) &userData[ss->vertUserAgeOffset]) = ss->currentAge;
00445 
00446     return v;
00447 }
00448 static void _vert_remEdge(CCGVert *v, CCGEdge *e)
00449 {
00450     int i;
00451     for (i = 0; i < v->numEdges; i++) {
00452         if (v->edges[i] == e) {
00453             v->edges[i] = v->edges[--v->numEdges];
00454             break;
00455         }
00456     }
00457 }
00458 static void _vert_remFace(CCGVert *v, CCGFace *f)
00459 {
00460     int i;
00461     for (i = 0; i < v->numFaces; i++) {
00462         if (v->faces[i] == f) {
00463             v->faces[i] = v->faces[--v->numFaces];
00464             break;
00465         }
00466     }
00467 }
00468 static void _vert_addEdge(CCGVert *v, CCGEdge *e, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00469 {
00470     v->edges = CCGSUBSURF_realloc(ss, v->edges, (v->numEdges + 1) * sizeof(*v->edges), v->numEdges * sizeof(*v->edges));
00471     v->edges[v->numEdges++] = e;
00472 }
00473 static void _vert_addFace(CCGVert *v, CCGFace *f, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00474 {
00475     v->faces = CCGSUBSURF_realloc(ss, v->faces, (v->numFaces + 1) * sizeof(*v->faces), v->numFaces * sizeof(*v->faces));
00476     v->faces[v->numFaces++] = f;
00477 }
00478 static CCGEdge *_vert_findEdgeTo(const CCGVert *v, const CCGVert *vQ)
00479 {
00480     int i;
00481     for (i = 0; i < v->numEdges; i++) {
00482         CCGEdge *e = v->edges[v->numEdges - 1 - i]; // XXX, note reverse
00483         if ((e->v0 == v && e->v1 == vQ) ||
00484             (e->v1 == v && e->v0 == vQ))
00485         {
00486             return e;
00487         }
00488     }
00489     return NULL;
00490 }
00491 static int _vert_isBoundary(const CCGVert *v)
00492 {
00493     int i;
00494     for (i = 0; i < v->numEdges; i++)
00495         if (_edge_isBoundary(v->edges[i]))
00496             return 1;
00497     return 0;
00498 }

00523 static CCGEdge *_edge_new(CCGEdgeHDL eHDL, CCGVert *v0, CCGVert *v1, float crease, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00524 {
00525     int num_edge_data = ccg_edgebase(ss->subdivLevels + 1);
00526     CCGEdge *e = CCGSUBSURF_alloc(ss,
00527                                   sizeof(CCGEdge) +
00528                                   ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize * num_edge_data +
00529                                   ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize);
00530     byte *userData;
00531 
00532     e->eHDL = eHDL;
00533     e->v0 = v0;
00534     e->v1 = v1;
00535     e->crease = crease;
00536     e->faces = NULL;
00537     e->numFaces = 0;
00538     e->flags = 0;
00539     _vert_addEdge(v0, e, ss);
00540     _vert_addEdge(v1, e, ss);
00541 
00542     userData = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e);
00543     memset(userData, 0, ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize);
00544     if (ss->useAgeCounts) *((int *) &userData[ss->edgeUserAgeOffset]) = ss->currentAge;
00545 
00546     return e;
00547 }
00548 static void _edge_remFace(CCGEdge *e, CCGFace *f)
00549 {
00550     int i;
00551     for (i = 0; i < e->numFaces; i++) {
00552         if (e->faces[i] == f) {
00553             e->faces[i] = e->faces[--e->numFaces];
00554             break;
00555         }
00556     }
00557 }
00558 static void _edge_addFace(CCGEdge *e, CCGFace *f, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00559 {
00560     e->faces = CCGSUBSURF_realloc(ss, e->faces, (e->numFaces + 1) * sizeof(*e->faces), e->numFaces * sizeof(*e->faces));
00561     e->faces[e->numFaces++] = f;
00562 }
00563 static int _edge_isBoundary(const CCGEdge *e)
00564 {
00565     return e->numFaces < 2;
00566 }

00568 static CCGVert *_edge_getOtherVert(CCGEdge *e, CCGVert *vQ)
00569 {
00570     if (vQ == e->v0) {
00571         return e->v1;
00572     }
00573     else {

00578 static void *_edge_getCo(CCGEdge *e, int lvl, int x, int dataSize)

00583 static float *_edge_getNo(CCGEdge *e, int lvl, int x, int dataSize, int normalDataOffset)

00585     int levelBase = ccg_edgebase(lvl);

00588 static void *_edge_getCoVert(CCGEdge *e, CCGVert *v, int lvl, int x, int dataSize)
00589 {
00590     int levelBase = ccg_edgebase(lvl);
00591     if (v == e->v0) {
00592         return &EDGE_getLevelData(e)[dataSize * (levelBase + x)];
00593     }
00594     else {
00595         return &EDGE_getLevelData(e)[dataSize * (levelBase + (1 << lvl) - x)];
00596     }
00597 }

00604 static void _edge_unlinkMarkAndFree(CCGEdge *e, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00605 {
00606     _vert_remEdge(e->v0, e);
00607     _vert_remEdge(e->v1, e);
00608     e->v0->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
00609     e->v1->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
00610     _edge_free(e, ss);
00611 }
00612 
00613 static float EDGE_getSharpness(CCGEdge *e, int lvl)
00614 {
00615     if (!lvl)
00616         return e->crease;
00617     else if (!e->crease)
00618         return 0.0f;
00619     else if (e->crease - lvl < 0.0f)
00620         return 0.0f;
00621     else
00622         return e->crease - lvl;
00623 }
00624 
00625 static CCGFace *_face_new(CCGFaceHDL fHDL, CCGVert **verts, CCGEdge **edges, int numVerts, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00626 {
00627     int maxGridSize = ccg_gridsize(ss->subdivLevels);
00628     int num_face_data = (numVerts * maxGridSize +
00629                          numVerts * maxGridSize * maxGridSize + 1);
00630     CCGFace *f = CCGSUBSURF_alloc(ss,
00631                                   sizeof(CCGFace) +
00632                                   sizeof(CCGVert *) * numVerts +
00633                                   sizeof(CCGEdge *) * numVerts +
00634                                   ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize * num_face_data +
00635                                   ss->meshIFC.faceUserSize);
00636     byte *userData;
00637     int i;
00638 
00639     f->numVerts = numVerts;
00640     f->fHDL = fHDL;
00641     f->flags = 0;
00642 
00643     for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
00644         FACE_getVerts(f)[i] = verts[i];
00645         FACE_getEdges(f)[i] = edges[i];
00646         _vert_addFace(verts[i], f, ss);
00647         _edge_addFace(edges[i], f, ss);
00648     }
00649 
00650     userData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceUserData(ss, f);
00651     memset(userData, 0, ss->meshIFC.faceUserSize);
00652     if (ss->useAgeCounts) *((int *) &userData[ss->faceUserAgeOffset]) = ss->currentAge;
00653 
00654     return f;
00655 }
00656 
00657 static CCG_INLINE void *_face_getIECo(CCGFace *f, int lvl, int S, int x, int levels, int dataSize)
00658 {
00659     int maxGridSize = ccg_gridsize(levels);
00660     int spacing = ccg_spacing(levels, lvl);
00661     byte *gridBase = FACE_getCenterData(f) + dataSize * (1 + S * (maxGridSize + maxGridSize * maxGridSize));
00662     return &gridBase[dataSize * x * spacing];
00663 }
00664 static CCG_INLINE void *_face_getIENo(CCGFace *f, int lvl, int S, int x, int levels, int dataSize, int normalDataOffset)
00665 {
00666     int maxGridSize = ccg_gridsize(levels);
00667     int spacing = ccg_spacing(levels, lvl);
00668     byte *gridBase = FACE_getCenterData(f) + dataSize * (1 + S * (maxGridSize + maxGridSize * maxGridSize));
00669     return &gridBase[dataSize * x * spacing + normalDataOffset];
00670 }
00671 static CCG_INLINE void *_face_getIFCo(CCGFace *f, int lvl, int S, int x, int y, int levels, int dataSize)
00672 {
00673     int maxGridSize = ccg_gridsize(levels);
00674     int spacing = ccg_spacing(levels, lvl);
00675     byte *gridBase = FACE_getCenterData(f) + dataSize * (1 + S * (maxGridSize + maxGridSize * maxGridSize));
00676     return &gridBase[dataSize * (maxGridSize + (y * maxGridSize + x) * spacing)];
00677 }
00678 static CCG_INLINE float *_face_getIFNo(CCGFace *f, int lvl, int S, int x, int y, int levels, int dataSize, int normalDataOffset)
00679 {
00680     int maxGridSize = ccg_gridsize(levels);
00681     int spacing = ccg_spacing(levels, lvl);
00682     byte *gridBase = FACE_getCenterData(f) + dataSize * (1 + S * (maxGridSize + maxGridSize * maxGridSize));
00683     return (float *) &gridBase[dataSize * (maxGridSize + (y * maxGridSize + x) * spacing) + normalDataOffset];
00684 }
00685 static int _face_getVertIndex(CCGFace *f, CCGVert *v)
00686 {
00687     int i;
00688     for (i = 0; i < f->numVerts; i++)
00689         if (FACE_getVerts(f)[i] == v)
00690             return i;
00691     return -1;
00692 }
00693 static int _face_getEdgeIndex(CCGFace *f, CCGEdge *e)
00694 {
00695     int i;
00696     for (i = 0; i < f->numVerts; i++)
00697         if (FACE_getEdges(f)[i] == e)
00698             return i;
00699     return -1;
00700 }
00701 static CCG_INLINE void *_face_getIFCoEdge(CCGFace *f, CCGEdge *e, int f_ed_idx, int lvl, int eX, int eY, int levels, int dataSize)
00702 {
00703     int maxGridSize = ccg_gridsize(levels);
00704     int spacing = ccg_spacing(levels, lvl);
00705     int x, y, cx, cy;
00706 
00707     BLI_assert(f_ed_idx == _face_getEdgeIndex(f, e));
00708 
00709     eX = eX * spacing;
00710     eY = eY * spacing;
00711     if (e->v0 != FACE_getVerts(f)[f_ed_idx]) {
00712         eX = (maxGridSize * 2 - 1) - 1 - eX;
00713     }
00714     y = maxGridSize - 1 - eX;
00715     x = maxGridSize - 1 - eY;
00716     if (x < 0) {
00717         f_ed_idx = (f_ed_idx + f->numVerts - 1) % f->numVerts;
00718         cx = y;
00719         cy = -x;
00720     }
00721     else if (y < 0) {
00722         f_ed_idx = (f_ed_idx + 1) % f->numVerts;
00723         cx = -y;
00724         cy = x;
00725     }
00726     else {
00727         cx = x;
00728         cy = y;
00729     }
00730     return _face_getIFCo(f, levels, f_ed_idx, cx, cy, levels, dataSize);
00731 }
00732 static float *_face_getIFNoEdge(CCGFace *f, CCGEdge *e, int f_ed_idx, int lvl, int eX, int eY, int levels, int dataSize, int normalDataOffset)
00733 {
00734     return (float *) ((byte *) _face_getIFCoEdge(f, e, f_ed_idx, lvl, eX, eY, levels, dataSize) + normalDataOffset);
00735 }
00736 static void _face_calcIFNo(CCGFace *f, int lvl, int S, int x, int y, float *no, int levels, int dataSize)
00737 {
00738     float *a = _face_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x + 0, y + 0, levels, dataSize);
00739     float *b = _face_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x + 1, y + 0, levels, dataSize);
00740     float *c = _face_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x + 1, y + 1, levels, dataSize);
00741     float *d = _face_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x + 0, y + 1, levels, dataSize);
00742     float a_cX = c[0] - a[0], a_cY = c[1] - a[1], a_cZ = c[2] - a[2];
00743     float b_dX = d[0] - b[0], b_dY = d[1] - b[1], b_dZ = d[2] - b[2];
00744     float length;
00745 
00746     no[0] = b_dY * a_cZ - b_dZ * a_cY;
00747     no[1] = b_dZ * a_cX - b_dX * a_cZ;
00748     no[2] = b_dX * a_cY - b_dY * a_cX;
00749 
00750     length = sqrtf(no[0] * no[0] + no[1] * no[1] + no[2] * no[2]);
00751 
00752     if (length > EPSILON) {
00753         float invLength = 1.0f / length;
00754 
00755         no[0] *= invLength;
00756         no[1] *= invLength;
00757         no[2] *= invLength;
00758     }
00759     else {
00760         NormZero(no);
00761     }
00762 }
00763 
00764 static void _face_free(CCGFace *f, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00765 {
00766     CCGSUBSURF_free(ss, f);
00767 }
00768 static void _face_unlinkMarkAndFree(CCGFace *f, CCGSubSurf *ss)
00769 {
00770     int j;
00771     for (j = 0; j < f->numVerts; j++) {
00772         _vert_remFace(FACE_getVerts(f)[j], f);
00773         _edge_remFace(FACE_getEdges(f)[j], f);
00774         FACE_getVerts(f)[j]->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
00775     }
00776     _face_free(f, ss);
00777 }
00778 
00779 /***/
00780 
00781 CCGSubSurf *ccgSubSurf_new(CCGMeshIFC *ifc, int subdivLevels, CCGAllocatorIFC *allocatorIFC, CCGAllocatorHDL allocator)
00782 {
00783     if (!allocatorIFC) {
00784         allocatorIFC = _getStandardAllocatorIFC();
00785         allocator = NULL;
00786     }
00787 
00788     if (subdivLevels < 1) {
00789         return NULL;
00790     }
00791     else {
00792         CCGSubSurf *ss = allocatorIFC->alloc(allocator, sizeof(*ss));
00793 
00794         ss->allocatorIFC = *allocatorIFC;
00795         ss->allocator = allocator;
00796 
00797         ss->vMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00798         ss->eMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00799         ss->fMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00800 
00801         ss->meshIFC = *ifc;
00802         
00803         ss->subdivLevels = subdivLevels;
00804         ss->numGrids = 0;
00805         ss->allowEdgeCreation = 0;
00806         ss->defaultCreaseValue = 0;
00807         ss->defaultEdgeUserData = NULL;
00808 
00809         ss->useAgeCounts = 0;
00810         ss->vertUserAgeOffset = ss->edgeUserAgeOffset = ss->faceUserAgeOffset = 0;
00811 
00812         ss->calcVertNormals = 0;
00813         ss->normalDataOffset = 0;
00814 
00815         ss->q = CCGSUBSURF_alloc(ss, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize);
00816         ss->r = CCGSUBSURF_alloc(ss, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize);
00817 
00818         ss->currentAge = 0;
00819 
00820         ss->syncState = eSyncState_None;
00821 
00822         ss->oldVMap = ss->oldEMap = ss->oldFMap = NULL;
00823         ss->lenTempArrays = 0;
00824         ss->tempVerts = NULL;
00825         ss->tempEdges = NULL;   
00826 
00827         return ss;
00828     }
00829 }
00830 
00831 void ccgSubSurf_free(CCGSubSurf *ss)
00832 {
00833     CCGAllocatorIFC allocatorIFC = ss->allocatorIFC;
00834     CCGAllocatorHDL allocator = ss->allocator;
00835 
00836     if (ss->syncState) {
00837         _ehash_free(ss->oldFMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _face_free, ss);
00838         _ehash_free(ss->oldEMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _edge_free, ss);
00839         _ehash_free(ss->oldVMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _vert_free, ss);
00840 
00841         MEM_freeN(ss->tempVerts);
00842         MEM_freeN(ss->tempEdges);
00843     }
00844 
00845     CCGSUBSURF_free(ss, ss->r);
00846     CCGSUBSURF_free(ss, ss->q);
00847     if (ss->defaultEdgeUserData) CCGSUBSURF_free(ss, ss->defaultEdgeUserData);
00848 
00849     _ehash_free(ss->fMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _face_free, ss);
00850     _ehash_free(ss->eMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _edge_free, ss);
00851     _ehash_free(ss->vMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _vert_free, ss);
00852 
00853     CCGSUBSURF_free(ss, ss);
00854 
00855     if (allocatorIFC.release) {
00856         allocatorIFC.release(allocator);
00857     }
00858 }
00859 
00860 CCGError ccgSubSurf_setAllowEdgeCreation(CCGSubSurf *ss, int allowEdgeCreation, float defaultCreaseValue, void *defaultUserData)
00861 {
00862     if (ss->defaultEdgeUserData) {
00863         CCGSUBSURF_free(ss, ss->defaultEdgeUserData);
00864     }
00865 
00866     ss->allowEdgeCreation = !!allowEdgeCreation;
00867     ss->defaultCreaseValue = defaultCreaseValue;
00868     ss->defaultEdgeUserData = CCGSUBSURF_alloc(ss, ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize);
00869 
00870     if (defaultUserData) {
00871         memcpy(ss->defaultEdgeUserData, defaultUserData, ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize);
00872     }
00873     else {
00874         memset(ss->defaultEdgeUserData, 0, ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize);
00875     }
00876 
00877     return eCCGError_None;
00878 }
00879 void ccgSubSurf_getAllowEdgeCreation(CCGSubSurf *ss, int *allowEdgeCreation_r, float *defaultCreaseValue_r, void *defaultUserData_r)
00880 {
00881     if (allowEdgeCreation_r) *allowEdgeCreation_r = ss->allowEdgeCreation;
00882     if (ss->allowEdgeCreation) {
00883         if (defaultCreaseValue_r) *defaultCreaseValue_r = ss->defaultCreaseValue;
00884         if (defaultUserData_r) memcpy(defaultUserData_r, ss->defaultEdgeUserData, ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize);
00885     }
00886 }
00887 
00888 CCGError ccgSubSurf_setSubdivisionLevels(CCGSubSurf *ss, int subdivisionLevels)
00889 {
00890     if (subdivisionLevels <= 0) {
00891         return eCCGError_InvalidValue;
00892     }
00893     else if (subdivisionLevels != ss->subdivLevels) {
00894         ss->numGrids = 0;
00895         ss->subdivLevels = subdivisionLevels;
00896         _ehash_free(ss->vMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _vert_free, ss);
00897         _ehash_free(ss->eMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _edge_free, ss);
00898         _ehash_free(ss->fMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _face_free, ss);
00899         ss->vMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00900         ss->eMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00901         ss->fMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00902     }
00903 
00904     return eCCGError_None;
00905 }
00906 
00907 void ccgSubSurf_getUseAgeCounts(CCGSubSurf *ss, int *useAgeCounts_r, int *vertUserOffset_r, int *edgeUserOffset_r, int *faceUserOffset_r)
00908 {
00909     *useAgeCounts_r = ss->useAgeCounts;
00910 
00911     if (vertUserOffset_r) *vertUserOffset_r = ss->vertUserAgeOffset;
00912     if (edgeUserOffset_r) *edgeUserOffset_r = ss->edgeUserAgeOffset;
00913     if (faceUserOffset_r) *faceUserOffset_r = ss->faceUserAgeOffset;
00914 }
00915 
00916 CCGError ccgSubSurf_setUseAgeCounts(CCGSubSurf *ss, int useAgeCounts, int vertUserOffset, int edgeUserOffset, int faceUserOffset)
00917 {
00918     if (useAgeCounts) {
00919         if ((vertUserOffset + 4 > ss->meshIFC.vertUserSize) ||
00920             (edgeUserOffset + 4 > ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize) ||
00921             (faceUserOffset + 4 > ss->meshIFC.faceUserSize))
00922         {
00923             return eCCGError_InvalidValue;
00924         }
00925         else {
00926             ss->useAgeCounts = 1;
00927             ss->vertUserAgeOffset = vertUserOffset;
00928             ss->edgeUserAgeOffset = edgeUserOffset;
00929             ss->faceUserAgeOffset = faceUserOffset;
00930         }
00931     }
00932     else {
00933         ss->useAgeCounts = 0;
00934         ss->vertUserAgeOffset = ss->edgeUserAgeOffset = ss->faceUserAgeOffset = 0;
00935     }
00936 
00937     return eCCGError_None;
00938 }
00939 
00940 CCGError ccgSubSurf_setCalcVertexNormals(CCGSubSurf *ss, int useVertNormals, int normalDataOffset)
00941 {
00942     if (useVertNormals) {
00943         if (normalDataOffset < 0 || normalDataOffset + 12 > ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize) {
00944             return eCCGError_InvalidValue;
00945         }
00946         else {
00947             ss->calcVertNormals = 1;
00948             ss->normalDataOffset = normalDataOffset;
00949         }
00950     }
00951     else {
00952         ss->calcVertNormals = 0;
00953         ss->normalDataOffset = 0;
00954     }
00955 
00956     return eCCGError_None;
00957 }
00958 
00959 /***/
00960 
00961 CCGError ccgSubSurf_initFullSync(CCGSubSurf *ss)
00962 {
00963     if (ss->syncState != eSyncState_None) {
00964         return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
00965     }
00966 
00967     ss->currentAge++;
00968 
00969     ss->oldVMap = ss->vMap; 
00970     ss->oldEMap = ss->eMap; 
00971     ss->oldFMap = ss->fMap;
00972 
00973     ss->vMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00974     ss->eMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00975     ss->fMap = _ehash_new(0, &ss->allocatorIFC, ss->allocator);
00976 
00977     ss->numGrids = 0;
00978 
00979     ss->lenTempArrays = 12;
00980     ss->tempVerts = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*ss->tempVerts) * ss->lenTempArrays, "CCGSubsurf tempVerts");
00981     ss->tempEdges = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*ss->tempEdges) * ss->lenTempArrays, "CCGSubsurf tempEdges");
00982 
00983     ss->syncState = eSyncState_Vert;
00984 
00985     return eCCGError_None;
00986 }
00987 
00988 CCGError ccgSubSurf_initPartialSync(CCGSubSurf *ss)
00989 {
00990     if (ss->syncState != eSyncState_None) {
00991         return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
00992     }
00993 
00994     ss->currentAge++;
00995 
00996     ss->syncState = eSyncState_Partial;
00997 
00998     return eCCGError_None;
00999 }
01000 
01001 CCGError ccgSubSurf_syncVertDel(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGVertHDL vHDL)
01002 {
01003     if (ss->syncState != eSyncState_Partial) {
01004         return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
01005     }
01006     else {
01007         void **prevp;
01008         CCGVert *v = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->vMap, vHDL, &prevp);
01009 
01010         if (!v || v->numFaces || v->numEdges) {
01011             return eCCGError_InvalidValue;
01012         }
01013         else {
01014             *prevp = v->next;
01015             _vert_free(v, ss);
01016         }
01017     }
01018 
01019     return eCCGError_None;
01020 }
01021 
01022 CCGError ccgSubSurf_syncEdgeDel(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGEdgeHDL eHDL)
01023 {
01024     if (ss->syncState != eSyncState_Partial) {
01025         return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
01026     }
01027     else {
01028         void **prevp;
01029         CCGEdge *e = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->eMap, eHDL, &prevp);
01030 
01031         if (!e || e->numFaces) {
01032             return eCCGError_InvalidValue;
01033         }
01034         else {
01035             *prevp = e->next;
01036             _edge_unlinkMarkAndFree(e, ss);
01037         }
01038     }
01039 
01040     return eCCGError_None;
01041 }
01042 
01043 CCGError ccgSubSurf_syncFaceDel(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFaceHDL fHDL)
01044 {
01045     if (ss->syncState != eSyncState_Partial) {
01046         return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
01047     }
01048     else {
01049         void **prevp;
01050         CCGFace *f = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->fMap, fHDL, &prevp);
01051 
01052         if (!f) {
01053             return eCCGError_InvalidValue;
01054         }
01055         else {
01056             *prevp = f->next;
01057             _face_unlinkMarkAndFree(f, ss);
01058         }
01059     }
01060 
01061     return eCCGError_None;
01062 }
01063 
01064 CCGError ccgSubSurf_syncVert(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGVertHDL vHDL, const void *vertData, int seam, CCGVert **v_r)
01065 {
01066     void **prevp;
01067     CCGVert *v = NULL;
01068     short seamflag = (seam) ? Vert_eSeam : 0;
01069     
01070     if (ss->syncState == eSyncState_Partial) {
01071         v = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->vMap, vHDL, &prevp);
01072         if (!v) {
01073             v = _vert_new(vHDL, ss);
01074             VertDataCopy(_vert_getCo(v, 0, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize), vertData);
01075             _ehash_insert(ss->vMap, (EHEntry *) v);
01076             v->flags = Vert_eEffected | seamflag;
01077         }
01078         else if (!VertDataEqual(vertData, _vert_getCo(v, 0, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize)) || ((v->flags & Vert_eSeam) != seamflag)) {
01079             int i, j;
01080 
01081             VertDataCopy(_vert_getCo(v, 0, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize), vertData);
01082             v->flags = Vert_eEffected | seamflag;
01083 
01084             for (i = 0; i < v->numEdges; i++) {
01085                 CCGEdge *e = v->edges[i];
01086                 e->v0->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01087                 e->v1->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01088             }
01089             for (i = 0; i < v->numFaces; i++) {
01090                 CCGFace *f = v->faces[i];
01091                 for (j = 0; j < f->numVerts; j++) {
01092                     FACE_getVerts(f)[j]->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01093                 }
01094             }
01095         }
01096     }
01097     else {
01098         if (ss->syncState != eSyncState_Vert) {
01099             return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
01100         }
01101 
01102         v = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->oldVMap, vHDL, &prevp);
01103         if (!v) {
01104             v = _vert_new(vHDL, ss);
01105             VertDataCopy(_vert_getCo(v, 0, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize), vertData);
01106             _ehash_insert(ss->vMap, (EHEntry *) v);
01107             v->flags = Vert_eEffected | seamflag;
01108         }
01109         else if (!VertDataEqual(vertData, _vert_getCo(v, 0, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize)) || ((v->flags & Vert_eSeam) != seamflag)) {
01110             *prevp = v->next;
01111             _ehash_insert(ss->vMap, (EHEntry *) v);
01112             VertDataCopy(_vert_getCo(v, 0, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize), vertData);
01113             v->flags = Vert_eEffected | Vert_eChanged | seamflag;
01114         }
01115         else {
01116             *prevp = v->next;
01117             _ehash_insert(ss->vMap, (EHEntry *) v);
01118             v->flags = 0;
01119         }
01120     }
01121 
01122     if (v_r) *v_r = v;
01123     return eCCGError_None;
01124 }
01125 
01126 CCGError ccgSubSurf_syncEdge(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGEdgeHDL eHDL, CCGVertHDL e_vHDL0, CCGVertHDL e_vHDL1, float crease, CCGEdge **e_r)
01127 {
01128     void **prevp;
01129     CCGEdge *e = NULL, *eNew;
01130 
01131     if (ss->syncState == eSyncState_Partial) {
01132         e = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->eMap, eHDL, &prevp);
01133         if (!e || e->v0->vHDL != e_vHDL0 || e->v1->vHDL != e_vHDL1 || crease != e->crease) {
01134             CCGVert *v0 = _ehash_lookup(ss->vMap, e_vHDL0);
01135             CCGVert *v1 = _ehash_lookup(ss->vMap, e_vHDL1);
01136 
01137             eNew = _edge_new(eHDL, v0, v1, crease, ss);
01138 
01139             if (e) {
01140                 *prevp = eNew;
01141                 eNew->next = e->next;
01142 
01143                 _edge_unlinkMarkAndFree(e, ss);
01144             }
01145             else {
01146                 _ehash_insert(ss->eMap, (EHEntry *) eNew);
01147             }
01148 
01149             eNew->v0->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01150             eNew->v1->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01151         }
01152     }
01153     else {
01154         if (ss->syncState == eSyncState_Vert) {
01155             ss->syncState = eSyncState_Edge;
01156         }
01157         else if (ss->syncState != eSyncState_Edge) {
01158             return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
01159         }
01160 
01161         e = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->oldEMap, eHDL, &prevp);
01162         if (!e || e->v0->vHDL != e_vHDL0 || e->v1->vHDL != e_vHDL1 || e->crease != crease) {
01163             CCGVert *v0 = _ehash_lookup(ss->vMap, e_vHDL0);
01164             CCGVert *v1 = _ehash_lookup(ss->vMap, e_vHDL1);
01165             e = _edge_new(eHDL, v0, v1, crease, ss);
01166             _ehash_insert(ss->eMap, (EHEntry *) e);
01167             e->v0->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01168             e->v1->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01169         }
01170         else {
01171             *prevp = e->next;
01172             _ehash_insert(ss->eMap, (EHEntry *) e);
01173             e->flags = 0;
01174             if ((e->v0->flags | e->v1->flags) & Vert_eChanged) {
01175                 e->v0->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01176                 e->v1->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01177             }
01178         }
01179     }
01180 
01181     if (e_r) *e_r = e;
01182     return eCCGError_None;
01183 }
01184 
01185 CCGError ccgSubSurf_syncFace(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFaceHDL fHDL, int numVerts, CCGVertHDL *vHDLs, CCGFace **f_r)
01186 {
01187     void **prevp;
01188     CCGFace *f = NULL, *fNew;
01189     int j, k, topologyChanged = 0;
01190 
01191     if (numVerts > ss->lenTempArrays) {
01192         ss->lenTempArrays = (numVerts < ss->lenTempArrays * 2) ? ss->lenTempArrays * 2 : numVerts;
01193         ss->tempVerts = MEM_reallocN(ss->tempVerts, sizeof(*ss->tempVerts) * ss->lenTempArrays);
01194         ss->tempEdges = MEM_reallocN(ss->tempEdges, sizeof(*ss->tempEdges) * ss->lenTempArrays);
01195     }
01196 
01197     if (ss->syncState == eSyncState_Partial) {
01198         f = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->fMap, fHDL, &prevp);
01199 
01200         for (k = 0; k < numVerts; k++) {
01201             ss->tempVerts[k] = _ehash_lookup(ss->vMap, vHDLs[k]);
01202         }
01203         for (k = 0; k < numVerts; k++) {
01204             ss->tempEdges[k] = _vert_findEdgeTo(ss->tempVerts[k], ss->tempVerts[(k + 1) % numVerts]);
01205         }
01206 
01207         if (f) {
01208             if (f->numVerts != numVerts ||
01209                 memcmp(FACE_getVerts(f), ss->tempVerts, sizeof(*ss->tempVerts) * numVerts) ||
01210                 memcmp(FACE_getEdges(f), ss->tempEdges, sizeof(*ss->tempEdges) * numVerts))
01211             {
01212                 topologyChanged = 1;
01213             }
01214         }
01215 
01216         if (!f || topologyChanged) {
01217             fNew = _face_new(fHDL, ss->tempVerts, ss->tempEdges, numVerts, ss);
01218 
01219             if (f) {
01220                 ss->numGrids += numVerts - f->numVerts;
01221 
01222                 *prevp = fNew;
01223                 fNew->next = f->next;
01224 
01225                 _face_unlinkMarkAndFree(f, ss);
01226             }
01227             else {
01228                 ss->numGrids += numVerts;
01229                 _ehash_insert(ss->fMap, (EHEntry *) fNew);
01230             }
01231 
01232             for (k = 0; k < numVerts; k++)
01233                 FACE_getVerts(fNew)[k]->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01234         }
01235     }
01236     else {
01237         if (ss->syncState == eSyncState_Vert || ss->syncState == eSyncState_Edge) {
01238             ss->syncState = eSyncState_Face;
01239         }
01240         else if (ss->syncState != eSyncState_Face) {
01241             return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
01242         }
01243 
01244         f = _ehash_lookupWithPrev(ss->oldFMap, fHDL, &prevp);
01245 
01246         for (k = 0; k < numVerts; k++) {
01247             ss->tempVerts[k] = _ehash_lookup(ss->vMap, vHDLs[k]);
01248 
01249             if (!ss->tempVerts[k])
01250                 return eCCGError_InvalidValue;
01251         }
01252         for (k = 0; k < numVerts; k++) {
01253             ss->tempEdges[k] = _vert_findEdgeTo(ss->tempVerts[k], ss->tempVerts[(k + 1) % numVerts]);
01254 
01255             if (!ss->tempEdges[k]) {
01256                 if (ss->allowEdgeCreation) {
01257                     CCGEdge *e = ss->tempEdges[k] = _edge_new((CCGEdgeHDL) - 1, ss->tempVerts[k], ss->tempVerts[(k + 1) % numVerts], ss->defaultCreaseValue, ss);
01258                     _ehash_insert(ss->eMap, (EHEntry *) e);
01259                     e->v0->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01260                     e->v1->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01261                     if (ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize) {
01262                         memcpy(ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e), ss->defaultEdgeUserData, ss->meshIFC.edgeUserSize);
01263                     }
01264                 }
01265                 else {
01266                     return eCCGError_InvalidValue;
01267                 }
01268             }
01269         }
01270 
01271         if (f) {
01272             if (f->numVerts != numVerts ||
01273                 memcmp(FACE_getVerts(f), ss->tempVerts, sizeof(*ss->tempVerts) * numVerts) ||
01274                 memcmp(FACE_getEdges(f), ss->tempEdges, sizeof(*ss->tempEdges) * numVerts))
01275                 topologyChanged = 1;
01276         }
01277 
01278         if (!f || topologyChanged) {
01279             f = _face_new(fHDL, ss->tempVerts, ss->tempEdges, numVerts, ss);
01280             _ehash_insert(ss->fMap, (EHEntry *) f);
01281             ss->numGrids += numVerts;
01282 
01283             for (k = 0; k < numVerts; k++)
01284                 FACE_getVerts(f)[k]->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01285         }
01286         else {
01287             *prevp = f->next;
01288             _ehash_insert(ss->fMap, (EHEntry *) f);
01289             f->flags = 0;
01290             ss->numGrids += f->numVerts;
01291 
01292             for (j = 0; j < f->numVerts; j++) {
01293                 if (FACE_getVerts(f)[j]->flags & Vert_eChanged) {
01294                     for (k = 0; k < f->numVerts; k++)
01295                         FACE_getVerts(f)[k]->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
01296                     break;
01297                 }
01298             }
01299         }
01300     }
01301 
01302     if (f_r) *f_r = f;
01303     return eCCGError_None;
01304 }
01305 
01306 CCGError ccgSubSurf_processSync(CCGSubSurf *ss)
01307 {
01308     if (ss->syncState == eSyncState_Partial) {
01309         ss->syncState = eSyncState_None;
01310 
01311         ccgSubSurf__sync(ss);
01312     }
01313     else if (ss->syncState) {
01314         _ehash_free(ss->oldFMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _face_unlinkMarkAndFree, ss);
01315         _ehash_free(ss->oldEMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _edge_unlinkMarkAndFree, ss);
01316         _ehash_free(ss->oldVMap, (EHEntryFreeFP) _vert_free, ss);
01317         MEM_freeN(ss->tempEdges);
01318         MEM_freeN(ss->tempVerts);
01319 
01320         ss->lenTempArrays = 0;
01321 
01322         ss->oldFMap = ss->oldEMap = ss->oldVMap = NULL;
01323         ss->tempVerts = NULL;
01324         ss->tempEdges = NULL;
01325 
01326         ss->syncState = eSyncState_None;
01327 
01328         ccgSubSurf__sync(ss);
01329     }
01330     else {
01331         return eCCGError_InvalidSyncState;
01332     }
01333 
01334     return eCCGError_None;
01335 }
01336 
01337 #define VERT_getNo(e, lvl)                  _vert_getNo(e, lvl, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset)
01338 #define EDGE_getNo(e, lvl, x)               _edge_getNo(e, lvl, x, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset)
01339 #define FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, y)       _face_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, y, subdivLevels, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset)
01340 #define FACE_calcIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, y, no)  _face_calcIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, y, no, subdivLevels, vertDataSize)
01341 #define FACE_getIENo(f, lvl, S, x)          _face_getIENo(f, lvl, S, x, subdivLevels, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset)
01342 
01343 static void ccgSubSurf__calcVertNormals(CCGSubSurf *ss,
01344                                         CCGVert **effectedV, CCGEdge **effectedE, CCGFace **effectedF,
01345                                         int numEffectedV, int numEffectedE, int numEffectedF)
01346 {
01347     int i, ptrIdx;
01348     int subdivLevels = ss->subdivLevels;
01349     int lvl = ss->subdivLevels;
01350     int edgeSize = ccg_edgesize(lvl);
01351     int gridSize = ccg_gridsize(lvl);
01352     int normalDataOffset = ss->normalDataOffset;
01353     int vertDataSize = ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize;
01354 
01355     #pragma omp parallel for private(ptrIdx) if (numEffectedF * edgeSize * edgeSize * 4 >= CCG_OMP_LIMIT)
01356     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedF; ptrIdx++) {
01357         CCGFace *f = (CCGFace *) effectedF[ptrIdx];
01358         int S, x, y;
01359         float no[3];
01360 
01361         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01362             for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++)
01363                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++)
01364                     NormZero(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, y));
01365 
01366             if (FACE_getEdges(f)[(S - 1 + f->numVerts) % f->numVerts]->flags & Edge_eEffected)
01367                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++)
01368                     NormZero(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, gridSize - 1));
01369             if (FACE_getEdges(f)[S]->flags & Edge_eEffected)
01370                 for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++)
01371                     NormZero(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, gridSize - 1, y));
01372             if (FACE_getVerts(f)[S]->flags & Vert_eEffected)
01373                 NormZero(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, gridSize - 1, gridSize - 1));
01374         }
01375 
01376         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01377             int yLimit = !(FACE_getEdges(f)[(S - 1 + f->numVerts) % f->numVerts]->flags & Edge_eEffected);
01378             int xLimit = !(FACE_getEdges(f)[S]->flags & Edge_eEffected);
01379             int yLimitNext = xLimit;
01380             int xLimitPrev = yLimit;
01381             
01382             for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01383                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01384                     int xPlusOk = (!xLimit || x < gridSize - 2);
01385                     int yPlusOk = (!yLimit || y < gridSize - 2);
01386 
01387                     FACE_calcIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, y, no);
01388 
01389                     NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x + 0, y + 0), no);
01390                     if (xPlusOk)
01391                         NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x + 1, y + 0), no);
01392                     if (yPlusOk)
01393                         NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x + 0, y + 1), no);
01394                     if (xPlusOk && yPlusOk) {
01395                         if (x < gridSize - 2 || y < gridSize - 2 || FACE_getVerts(f)[S]->flags & Vert_eEffected) {
01396                             NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x + 1, y + 1), no);
01397                         }
01398                     }
01399 
01400                     if (x == 0 && y == 0) {
01401                         int K;
01402 
01403                         if (!yLimitNext || 1 < gridSize - 1)
01404                             NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 0, 1), no);
01405                         if (!xLimitPrev || 1 < gridSize - 1)
01406                             NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, (S - 1 + f->numVerts) % f->numVerts, 1, 0), no);
01407 
01408                         for (K = 0; K < f->numVerts; K++) {
01409                             if (K != S) {
01410                                 NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, K, 0, 0), no);
01411                             }
01412                         }
01413                     }
01414                     else if (y == 0) {
01415                         NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 0, x), no);
01416                         if (!yLimitNext || x < gridSize - 2)
01417                             NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 0, x + 1), no);
01418                     }
01419                     else if (x == 0) {
01420                         NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, (S - 1 + f->numVerts) % f->numVerts, y, 0), no);
01421                         if (!xLimitPrev || y < gridSize - 2)
01422                             NormAdd(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, (S - 1 + f->numVerts) % f->numVerts, y + 1, 0), no);
01423                     }
01424                 }
01425             }
01426         }
01427     }
01428     /* XXX can I reduce the number of normalisations here? */
01429     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedV; ptrIdx++) {
01430         CCGVert *v = (CCGVert *) effectedV[ptrIdx];
01431         float length, *no = _vert_getNo(v, lvl, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset);
01432 
01433         NormZero(no);
01434 
01435         for (i = 0; i < v->numFaces; i++) {
01436             CCGFace *f = v->faces[i];
01437             NormAdd(no, FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, _face_getVertIndex(f, v), gridSize - 1, gridSize - 1));
01438         }
01439 
01440         length = sqrtf(no[0] * no[0] + no[1] * no[1] + no[2] * no[2]);
01441 
01442         if (length > EPSILON) {
01443             float invLength = 1.0f / length;
01444             no[0] *= invLength;
01445             no[1] *= invLength;
01446             no[2] *= invLength;
01447         }
01448         else {
01449             NormZero(no);
01450         }
01451 
01452         for (i = 0; i < v->numFaces; i++) {
01453             CCGFace *f = v->faces[i];
01454             NormCopy(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, _face_getVertIndex(f, v), gridSize - 1, gridSize - 1), no);
01455         }
01456     }
01457     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedE; ptrIdx++) {
01458         CCGEdge *e = (CCGEdge *) effectedE[ptrIdx];
01459 
01460         if (e->numFaces) {
01461             CCGFace *fLast = e->faces[e->numFaces - 1];
01462             int x;
01463 
01464             for (i = 0; i < e->numFaces - 1; i++) {
01465                 CCGFace *f = e->faces[i];
01466                 const int f_ed_idx = _face_getEdgeIndex(f, e);
01467                 const int f_ed_idx_last = _face_getEdgeIndex(fLast, e);
01468 
01469                 for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
01470                     NormAdd(_face_getIFNoEdge(fLast, e, f_ed_idx_last, lvl, x, 0, subdivLevels, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset),
01471                             _face_getIFNoEdge(f, e, f_ed_idx, lvl, x, 0, subdivLevels, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset));
01472                 }
01473             }
01474 
01475             for (i = 0; i < e->numFaces - 1; i++) {
01476                 CCGFace *f = e->faces[i];
01477                 const int f_ed_idx = _face_getEdgeIndex(f, e);
01478                 const int f_ed_idx_last = _face_getEdgeIndex(fLast, e);
01479 
01480                 for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
01481                     NormCopy(_face_getIFNoEdge(f, e, f_ed_idx, lvl, x, 0, subdivLevels, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset),
01482                              _face_getIFNoEdge(fLast, e, f_ed_idx_last, lvl, x, 0, subdivLevels, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset));
01483                 }
01484             }
01485         }
01486     }
01487 
01488     #pragma omp parallel for private(ptrIdx) if (numEffectedF * edgeSize * edgeSize * 4 >= CCG_OMP_LIMIT)
01489     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedF; ptrIdx++) {
01490         CCGFace *f = (CCGFace *) effectedF[ptrIdx];
01491         int S, x, y;
01492 
01493         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01494             NormCopy(FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 0, gridSize - 1),
01495                      FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, gridSize - 1, 0));
01496         }
01497 
01498         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01499             for (y = 0; y < gridSize; y++) {
01500                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++) {
01501                     float *no = FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, y);
01502                     float length = sqrtf(no[0] * no[0] + no[1] * no[1] + no[2] * no[2]);
01503 
01504                     if (length > EPSILON) {
01505                         float invLength = 1.0f / length;
01506                         no[0] *= invLength;
01507                         no[1] *= invLength;
01508                         no[2] *= invLength;
01509                     }
01510                     else {
01511                         NormZero(no);
01512                     }
01513                 }
01514             }
01515 
01516             VertDataCopy((float *)((byte *)FACE_getCenterData(f) + normalDataOffset),
01517                          FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, 0, 0));
01518 
01519             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++)
01520                 NormCopy(FACE_getIENo(f, lvl, S, x),
01521                          FACE_getIFNo(f, lvl, S, x, 0));
01522         }
01523     }
01524 
01525     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedE; ptrIdx++) {
01526         CCGEdge *e = (CCGEdge *) effectedE[ptrIdx];
01527 
01528         if (e->numFaces) {
01529             CCGFace *f = e->faces[0];
01530             int x;
01531             const int f_ed_idx = _face_getEdgeIndex(f, e);
01532 
01533             for (x = 0; x < edgeSize; x++)
01534                 NormCopy(EDGE_getNo(e, lvl, x),
01535                          _face_getIFNoEdge(f, e, f_ed_idx, lvl, x, 0, subdivLevels, vertDataSize, normalDataOffset));
01536         }
01537         else {
01538             /* set to zero here otherwise the normals are uninitialized memory
01539              * render: tests/animation/knight.blend with valgrind.
01540              * we could be more clever and interpolate vertex normals but these are
01541              * most likely not used so just zero out. */
01542             int x;
01543 
01544             for (x = 0; x < edgeSize; x++) {
01545                 NormZero(EDGE_getNo(e, lvl, x));
01546             }
01547         }
01548     }
01549 }
01550 #undef FACE_getIFNo
01551 
01552 #define VERT_getCo(v, lvl)              _vert_getCo(v, lvl, vertDataSize)
01553 #define EDGE_getCo(e, lvl, x)           _edge_getCo(e, lvl, x, vertDataSize)
01554 #define FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, x)      _face_getIECo(f, lvl, S, x, subdivLevels, vertDataSize)
01555 #define FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, y)   _face_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, y, subdivLevels, vertDataSize)
01556 
01557 static void ccgSubSurf__calcSubdivLevel(CCGSubSurf *ss,
01558                                         CCGVert **effectedV, CCGEdge **effectedE, CCGFace **effectedF,
01559                                         int numEffectedV, int numEffectedE, int numEffectedF, int curLvl)
01560 {
01561     int subdivLevels = ss->subdivLevels;
01562     int edgeSize = ccg_edgesize(curLvl);
01563     int gridSize = ccg_gridsize(curLvl);
01564     int nextLvl = curLvl + 1;
01565     int ptrIdx, cornerIdx, i;
01566     int vertDataSize = ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize;
01567     void *q = ss->q, *r = ss->r;
01568 
01569     #pragma omp parallel for private(ptrIdx) if (numEffectedF * edgeSize * edgeSize * 4 >= CCG_OMP_LIMIT)
01570     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedF; ptrIdx++) {
01571         CCGFace *f = (CCGFace *) effectedF[ptrIdx];
01572         int S, x, y;
01573 
01574         /* interior face midpoints
01575          * - old interior face points
01576          */
01577         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01578             for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01579                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01580                     int fx = 1 + 2 * x;
01581                     int fy = 1 + 2 * y;
01582                     void *co0 = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x + 0, y + 0);
01583                     void *co1 = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x + 1, y + 0);
01584                     void *co2 = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x + 1, y + 1);
01585                     void *co3 = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x + 0, y + 1);
01586                     void *co = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx, fy);
01587 
01588                     VertDataAvg4(co, co0, co1, co2, co3);
01589                 }
01590             }
01591         }
01592 
01593         /* interior edge midpoints
01594          * - old interior edge points
01595          * - new interior face midpoints
01596          */
01597         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01598             for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01599                 int fx = x * 2 + 1;
01600                 void *co0 = FACE_getIECo(f, curLvl, S, x + 0);
01601                 void *co1 = FACE_getIECo(f, curLvl, S, x + 1);
01602                 void *co2 = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 1, fx);
01603                 void *co3 = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx, 1);
01604                 void *co  = FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, fx);
01605                 
01606                 VertDataAvg4(co, co0, co1, co2, co3);
01607             }
01608 
01609             /* interior face interior edge midpoints
01610              * - old interior face points
01611              * - new interior face midpoints
01612              */
01613 
01614             /* vertical */
01615             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01616                 for (y = 0; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01617                     int fx = x * 2;
01618                     int fy = y * 2 + 1;
01619                     void *co0 = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x, y + 0);
01620                     void *co1 = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x, y + 1);
01621                     void *co2 = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx - 1, fy);
01622                     void *co3 = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx + 1, fy);
01623                     void *co  = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx, fy);
01624 
01625                     VertDataAvg4(co, co0, co1, co2, co3);
01626                 }
01627             }
01628 
01629             /* horizontal */
01630             for (y = 1; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01631                 for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01632                     int fx = x * 2 + 1;
01633                     int fy = y * 2;
01634                     void *co0 = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x + 0, y);
01635                     void *co1 = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x + 1, y);
01636                     void *co2 = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx, fy - 1);
01637                     void *co3 = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx, fy + 1);
01638                     void *co  = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx, fy);
01639 
01640                     VertDataAvg4(co, co0, co1, co2, co3);
01641                 }
01642             }
01643         }
01644     }
01645 
01646     /* exterior edge midpoints
01647      * - old exterior edge points
01648      * - new interior face midpoints
01649      */
01650     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedE; ptrIdx++) {
01651         CCGEdge *e = (CCGEdge *) effectedE[ptrIdx];
01652         float sharpness = EDGE_getSharpness(e, curLvl);
01653         int x, j;
01654 
01655         if (_edge_isBoundary(e) || sharpness > 1.0f) {
01656             for (x = 0; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
01657                 int fx = x * 2 + 1;
01658                 void *co0 = EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x + 0);
01659                 void *co1 = EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x + 1);
01660                 void *co  = EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, fx);
01661 
01662                 VertDataCopy(co, co0);
01663                 VertDataAdd(co, co1);
01664                 VertDataMulN(co, 0.5f);
01665             }
01666         }
01667         else {
01668             for (x = 0; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
01669                 int fx = x * 2 + 1;
01670                 void *co0 = EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x + 0);
01671                 void *co1 = EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x + 1);
01672                 void *co  = EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, fx);
01673                 int numFaces = 0;
01674 
01675                 VertDataCopy(q, co0);
01676                 VertDataAdd(q, co1);
01677 
01678                 for (j = 0; j < e->numFaces; j++) {
01679                     CCGFace *f = e->faces[j];
01680                     const int f_ed_idx = _face_getEdgeIndex(f, e);
01681                     VertDataAdd(q, _face_getIFCoEdge(f, e, f_ed_idx, nextLvl, fx, 1, subdivLevels, vertDataSize));
01682                     numFaces++;
01683                 }
01684 
01685                 VertDataMulN(q, 1.0f / (2.0f + numFaces));
01686 
01687                 VertDataCopy(r, co0);
01688                 VertDataAdd(r, co1);
01689                 VertDataMulN(r, 0.5f);
01690 
01691                 VertDataCopy(co, q);
01692                 VertDataSub(r, q);
01693                 VertDataMulN(r, sharpness);
01694                 VertDataAdd(co, r);
01695             }
01696         }
01697     }
01698 
01699     /* exterior vertex shift
01700      * - old vertex points (shifting)
01701      * - old exterior edge points
01702      * - new interior face midpoints
01703      */
01704     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedV; ptrIdx++) {
01705         CCGVert *v = (CCGVert *) effectedV[ptrIdx];
01706         void *co = VERT_getCo(v, curLvl);
01707         void *nCo = VERT_getCo(v, nextLvl);
01708         int sharpCount = 0, allSharp = 1;
01709         float avgSharpness = 0.0;
01710         int j, seam = VERT_seam(v), seamEdges = 0;
01711 
01712         for (j = 0; j < v->numEdges; j++) {
01713             CCGEdge *e = v->edges[j];
01714             float sharpness = EDGE_getSharpness(e, curLvl);
01715 
01716             if (seam && _edge_isBoundary(e))
01717                 seamEdges++;
01718 
01719             if (sharpness != 0.0f) {
01720                 sharpCount++;
01721                 avgSharpness += sharpness;
01722             }
01723             else {
01724                 allSharp = 0;
01725             }
01726         }
01727 
01728         if (sharpCount) {
01729             avgSharpness /= sharpCount;
01730             if (avgSharpness > 1.0f) {
01731                 avgSharpness = 1.0f;
01732             }
01733         }
01734 
01735         if (seamEdges < 2 || seamEdges != v->numEdges)
01736             seam = 0;
01737 
01738         if (!v->numEdges) {
01739             VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
01740         }
01741         else if (_vert_isBoundary(v)) {
01742             int numBoundary = 0;
01743 
01744             VertDataZero(r);
01745             for (j = 0; j < v->numEdges; j++) {
01746                 CCGEdge *e = v->edges[j];
01747                 if (_edge_isBoundary(e)) {
01748                     VertDataAdd(r, _edge_getCoVert(e, v, curLvl, 1, vertDataSize));
01749                     numBoundary++;
01750                 }
01751             }
01752 
01753             VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
01754             VertDataMulN(nCo, 0.75f);
01755             VertDataMulN(r, 0.25f / numBoundary);
01756             VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
01757         }
01758         else {
01759             int cornerIdx = (1 + (1 << (curLvl))) - 2;
01760             int numEdges = 0, numFaces = 0;
01761 
01762             VertDataZero(q);
01763             for (j = 0; j < v->numFaces; j++) {
01764                 CCGFace *f = v->faces[j];
01765                 VertDataAdd(q, FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, _face_getVertIndex(f, v), cornerIdx, cornerIdx));
01766                 numFaces++;
01767             }
01768             VertDataMulN(q, 1.0f / numFaces);
01769             VertDataZero(r);
01770             for (j = 0; j < v->numEdges; j++) {
01771                 CCGEdge *e = v->edges[j];
01772                 VertDataAdd(r, _edge_getCoVert(e, v, curLvl, 1, vertDataSize));
01773                 numEdges++;
01774             }
01775             VertDataMulN(r, 1.0f / numEdges);
01776 
01777             VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
01778             VertDataMulN(nCo, numEdges - 2.0f);
01779             VertDataAdd(nCo, q);
01780             VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
01781             VertDataMulN(nCo, 1.0f / numEdges);
01782         }
01783 
01784         if ((sharpCount > 1 && v->numFaces) || seam) {
01785             VertDataZero(q);
01786 
01787             if (seam) {
01788                 avgSharpness = 1.0f;
01789                 sharpCount = seamEdges;
01790                 allSharp = 1;
01791             }
01792 
01793             for (j = 0; j < v->numEdges; j++) {
01794                 CCGEdge *e = v->edges[j];
01795                 float sharpness = EDGE_getSharpness(e, curLvl);
01796 
01797                 if (seam) {
01798                     if (_edge_isBoundary(e))
01799                         VertDataAdd(q, _edge_getCoVert(e, v, curLvl, 1, vertDataSize));
01800                 }
01801                 else if (sharpness != 0.0f) {
01802                     VertDataAdd(q, _edge_getCoVert(e, v, curLvl, 1, vertDataSize));
01803                 }
01804             }
01805 
01806             VertDataMulN(q, (float) 1 / sharpCount);
01807 
01808             if (sharpCount != 2 || allSharp) {
01809                 /* q = q + (co - q) * avgSharpness */
01810                 VertDataCopy(r, co);
01811                 VertDataSub(r, q);
01812                 VertDataMulN(r, avgSharpness);
01813                 VertDataAdd(q, r);
01814             }
01815 
01816             /* r = co * 0.75 + q * 0.25 */
01817             VertDataCopy(r, co);
01818             VertDataMulN(r, .75f);
01819             VertDataMulN(q, .25f);
01820             VertDataAdd(r, q);
01821 
01822             /* nCo = nCo  + (r - nCo) * avgSharpness */
01823             VertDataSub(r, nCo);
01824             VertDataMulN(r, avgSharpness);
01825             VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
01826         }
01827     }
01828 
01829     /* exterior edge interior shift
01830      * - old exterior edge midpoints (shifting)
01831      * - old exterior edge midpoints
01832      * - new interior face midpoints
01833      */
01834     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedE; ptrIdx++) {
01835         CCGEdge *e = (CCGEdge *) effectedE[ptrIdx];
01836         float sharpness = EDGE_getSharpness(e, curLvl);
01837         int sharpCount = 0;
01838         float avgSharpness = 0.0;
01839         int x, j;
01840 
01841         if (sharpness != 0.0f) {
01842             sharpCount = 2;
01843             avgSharpness += sharpness;
01844 
01845             if (avgSharpness > 1.0f) {
01846                 avgSharpness = 1.0f;
01847             }
01848         }
01849         else {
01850             sharpCount = 0;
01851             avgSharpness = 0;
01852         }
01853 
01854         if (_edge_isBoundary(e) && (!e->numFaces || sharpCount < 2)) {
01855             for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
01856                 int fx = x * 2;
01857                 void *co = EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x);
01858                 void *nCo = EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, fx);
01859                 VertDataCopy(r, EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x - 1));
01860                 VertDataAdd(r, EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x + 1));
01861                 VertDataMulN(r, 0.5f);
01862                 VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
01863                 VertDataMulN(nCo, 0.75f);
01864                 VertDataMulN(r, 0.25f);
01865                 VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
01866             }
01867         }
01868         else {
01869             for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++) {
01870                 int fx = x * 2;
01871                 void *co = EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x);
01872                 void *nCo = EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, fx);
01873                 int numFaces = 0;
01874 
01875                 VertDataZero(q);
01876                 VertDataZero(r);
01877                 VertDataAdd(r, EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x - 1));
01878                 VertDataAdd(r, EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x + 1));
01879                 for (j = 0; j < e->numFaces; j++) {
01880                     CCGFace *f = e->faces[j];
01881                     int f_ed_idx = _face_getEdgeIndex(f, e);
01882                     VertDataAdd(q, _face_getIFCoEdge(f, e, f_ed_idx, nextLvl, fx - 1, 1, subdivLevels, vertDataSize));
01883                     VertDataAdd(q, _face_getIFCoEdge(f, e, f_ed_idx, nextLvl, fx + 1, 1, subdivLevels, vertDataSize));
01884 
01885                     VertDataAdd(r, _face_getIFCoEdge(f, e, f_ed_idx, curLvl, x, 1, subdivLevels, vertDataSize));
01886                     numFaces++;
01887                 }
01888                 VertDataMulN(q, 1.0f / (numFaces * 2.0f));
01889                 VertDataMulN(r, 1.0f / (2.0f + numFaces));
01890 
01891                 VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
01892                 VertDataMulN(nCo, (float) numFaces);
01893                 VertDataAdd(nCo, q);
01894                 VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
01895                 VertDataMulN(nCo, 1.0f / (2 + numFaces));
01896 
01897                 if (sharpCount == 2) {
01898                     VertDataCopy(q, co);
01899                     VertDataMulN(q, 6.0f);
01900                     VertDataAdd(q, EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x - 1));
01901                     VertDataAdd(q, EDGE_getCo(e, curLvl, x + 1));
01902                     VertDataMulN(q, 1 / 8.0f);
01903 
01904                     VertDataSub(q, nCo);
01905                     VertDataMulN(q, avgSharpness);
01906                     VertDataAdd(nCo, q);
01907                 }
01908             }
01909         }
01910     }
01911 
01912     #pragma omp parallel private(ptrIdx) if (numEffectedF * edgeSize * edgeSize * 4 >= CCG_OMP_LIMIT)
01913     {
01914         void *q, *r;
01915 
01916         #pragma omp critical
01917         {
01918             q = MEM_mallocN(ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize, "CCGSubsurf q");
01919             r = MEM_mallocN(ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize, "CCGSubsurf r");
01920         }
01921 
01922         #pragma omp for schedule(static)
01923         for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedF; ptrIdx++) {
01924             CCGFace *f = (CCGFace *) effectedF[ptrIdx];
01925             int S, x, y;
01926 
01927             /* interior center point shift
01928              * - old face center point (shifting)
01929              * - old interior edge points
01930              * - new interior face midpoints
01931              */
01932             VertDataZero(q);
01933             for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01934                 VertDataAdd(q, FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, 1, 1));
01935             }
01936             VertDataMulN(q, 1.0f / f->numVerts);
01937             VertDataZero(r);
01938             for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01939                 VertDataAdd(r, FACE_getIECo(f, curLvl, S, 1));
01940             }
01941             VertDataMulN(r, 1.0f / f->numVerts);
01942 
01943             VertDataMulN(FACE_getCenterData(f), f->numVerts - 2.0f);
01944             VertDataAdd(FACE_getCenterData(f), q);
01945             VertDataAdd(FACE_getCenterData(f), r);
01946             VertDataMulN(FACE_getCenterData(f), 1.0f / f->numVerts);
01947 
01948             for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
01949                 /* interior face shift
01950                  * - old interior face point (shifting)
01951                  * - new interior edge midpoints
01952                  * - new interior face midpoints
01953                  */
01954                 for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01955                     for (y = 1; y < gridSize - 1; y++) {
01956                         int fx = x * 2;
01957                         int fy = y * 2;
01958                         void *co = FACE_getIFCo(f, curLvl, S, x, y);
01959                         void *nCo = FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx, fy);
01960                         
01961                         VertDataAvg4(q,
01962                                      FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx - 1, fy - 1),
01963                                      FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx + 1, fy - 1),
01964                                      FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx + 1, fy + 1),
01965                                      FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx - 1, fy + 1));
01966 
01967                         VertDataAvg4(r,
01968                                      FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx - 1, fy + 0),
01969                                      FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx + 1, fy + 0),
01970                                      FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx + 0, fy - 1),
01971                                      FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx + 0, fy + 1));
01972 
01973                         VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
01974                         VertDataSub(nCo, q);
01975                         VertDataMulN(nCo, 0.25f);
01976                         VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
01977                     }
01978                 }
01979 
01980                 /* interior edge interior shift
01981                  * - old interior edge point (shifting)
01982                  * - new interior edge midpoints
01983                  * - new interior face midpoints
01984                  */
01985                 for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
01986                     int fx = x * 2;
01987                     void *co = FACE_getIECo(f, curLvl, S, x);
01988                     void *nCo = FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, fx);
01989                     
01990                     VertDataAvg4(q,
01991                                  FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 1, fx - 1),
01992                                  FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 1, fx + 1),
01993                                  FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx + 1, +1),
01994                                  FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx - 1, +1));
01995 
01996                     VertDataAvg4(r,
01997                                  FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, fx - 1),
01998                                  FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, fx + 1),
01999                                  FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 1, fx),
02000                                  FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, fx, 1));
02001 
02002                     VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
02003                     VertDataSub(nCo, q);
02004                     VertDataMulN(nCo, 0.25f);
02005                     VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
02006                 }
02007             }
02008         }
02009 
02010         #pragma omp critical
02011         {
02012             MEM_freeN(q);
02013             MEM_freeN(r);
02014         }
02015     }
02016 
02017     /* copy down */
02018     edgeSize = ccg_edgesize(nextLvl);
02019     gridSize = ccg_gridsize(nextLvl);
02020     cornerIdx = gridSize - 1;
02021 
02022     #pragma omp parallel for private(i) if (numEffectedF * edgeSize * edgeSize * 4 >= CCG_OMP_LIMIT)
02023     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedE; i++) {
02024         CCGEdge *e = effectedE[i];
02025         VertDataCopy(EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, 0), VERT_getCo(e->v0, nextLvl));
02026         VertDataCopy(EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, edgeSize - 1), VERT_getCo(e->v1, nextLvl));
02027     }
02028 
02029     #pragma omp parallel for private(i) if (numEffectedF * edgeSize * edgeSize * 4 >= CCG_OMP_LIMIT)
02030     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++) {
02031         CCGFace *f = effectedF[i];
02032         int S, x;
02033 
02034         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
02035             CCGEdge *e = FACE_getEdges(f)[S];
02036             CCGEdge *prevE = FACE_getEdges(f)[(S + f->numVerts - 1) % f->numVerts];
02037 
02038             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, 0, 0), FACE_getCenterData(f));
02039             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, 0), FACE_getCenterData(f));
02040             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, cornerIdx, cornerIdx), VERT_getCo(FACE_getVerts(f)[S], nextLvl));
02041             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, cornerIdx), EDGE_getCo(FACE_getEdges(f)[S], nextLvl, cornerIdx));
02042             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
02043                 void *co = FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, x);
02044                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, x, 0), co);
02045                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, (S + 1) % f->numVerts, 0, x), co);
02046             }
02047             for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
02048                 int eI = gridSize - 1 - x;
02049                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, cornerIdx, x), _edge_getCoVert(e, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], nextLvl, eI, vertDataSize));
02050                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, x, cornerIdx), _edge_getCoVert(prevE, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], nextLvl, eI, vertDataSize));
02051             }
02052         }
02053     }
02054 }
02055 
02056 
02057 static void ccgSubSurf__sync(CCGSubSurf *ss)
02058 {
02059     CCGVert **effectedV;
02060     CCGEdge **effectedE;
02061     CCGFace **effectedF;
02062     int numEffectedV, numEffectedE, numEffectedF;
02063     int subdivLevels = ss->subdivLevels;
02064     int vertDataSize = ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize;
02065     int i, j, ptrIdx, S;
02066     int curLvl, nextLvl;
02067     void *q = ss->q, *r = ss->r;
02068 
02069     effectedV = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*effectedV) * ss->vMap->numEntries, "CCGSubsurf effectedV");
02070     effectedE = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*effectedE) * ss->eMap->numEntries, "CCGSubsurf effectedE");
02071     effectedF = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*effectedF) * ss->fMap->numEntries, "CCGSubsurf effectedF");
02072     numEffectedV = numEffectedE = numEffectedF = 0;
02073     for (i = 0; i < ss->vMap->curSize; i++) {
02074         CCGVert *v = (CCGVert *) ss->vMap->buckets[i];
02075         for (; v; v = v->next) {
02076             if (v->flags & Vert_eEffected) {
02077                 effectedV[numEffectedV++] = v;
02078 
02079                 for (j = 0; j < v->numEdges; j++) {
02080                     CCGEdge *e = v->edges[j];
02081                     if (!(e->flags & Edge_eEffected)) {
02082                         effectedE[numEffectedE++] = e;
02083                         e->flags |= Edge_eEffected;
02084                     }
02085                 }
02086 
02087                 for (j = 0; j < v->numFaces; j++) {
02088                     CCGFace *f = v->faces[j];
02089                     if (!(f->flags & Face_eEffected)) {
02090                         effectedF[numEffectedF++] = f;
02091                         f->flags |= Face_eEffected;
02092                     }
02093                 }
02094             }
02095         }
02096     }
02097 
02098     curLvl = 0;
02099     nextLvl = curLvl + 1;
02100 
02101     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedF; ptrIdx++) {
02102         CCGFace *f = effectedF[ptrIdx];
02103         void *co = FACE_getCenterData(f);
02104         VertDataZero(co);
02105         for (i = 0; i < f->numVerts; i++) {
02106             VertDataAdd(co, VERT_getCo(FACE_getVerts(f)[i], curLvl));
02107         }
02108         VertDataMulN(co, 1.0f / f->numVerts);
02109 
02110         f->flags = 0;
02111     }
02112     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedE; ptrIdx++) {
02113         CCGEdge *e = effectedE[ptrIdx];
02114         void *co = EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, 1);
02115         float sharpness = EDGE_getSharpness(e, curLvl);
02116 
02117         if (_edge_isBoundary(e) || sharpness >= 1.0f) {
02118             VertDataCopy(co, VERT_getCo(e->v0, curLvl));
02119             VertDataAdd(co, VERT_getCo(e->v1, curLvl));
02120             VertDataMulN(co, 0.5f);
02121         }
02122         else {
02123             int numFaces = 0;
02124             VertDataCopy(q, VERT_getCo(e->v0, curLvl));
02125             VertDataAdd(q, VERT_getCo(e->v1, curLvl));
02126             for (i = 0; i < e->numFaces; i++) {
02127                 CCGFace *f = e->faces[i];
02128                 VertDataAdd(q, FACE_getCenterData(f));
02129                 numFaces++;
02130             }
02131             VertDataMulN(q, 1.0f / (2.0f + numFaces));
02132 
02133             VertDataCopy(r, VERT_getCo(e->v0, curLvl));
02134             VertDataAdd(r, VERT_getCo(e->v1, curLvl));
02135             VertDataMulN(r, 0.5f);
02136 
02137             VertDataCopy(co, q);
02138             VertDataSub(r, q);
02139             VertDataMulN(r, sharpness);
02140             VertDataAdd(co, r);
02141         }
02142 
02143         // edge flags cleared later
02144     }
02145     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedV; ptrIdx++) {
02146         CCGVert *v = effectedV[ptrIdx];
02147         void *co = VERT_getCo(v, curLvl);
02148         void *nCo = VERT_getCo(v, nextLvl);
02149         int sharpCount = 0, allSharp = 1;
02150         float avgSharpness = 0.0;
02151         int seam = VERT_seam(v), seamEdges = 0;
02152 
02153         for (i = 0; i < v->numEdges; i++) {
02154             CCGEdge *e = v->edges[i];
02155             float sharpness = EDGE_getSharpness(e, curLvl);
02156 
02157             if (seam && _edge_isBoundary(e))
02158                 seamEdges++;
02159 
02160             if (sharpness != 0.0f) {
02161                 sharpCount++;
02162                 avgSharpness += sharpness;
02163             }
02164             else {
02165                 allSharp = 0;
02166             }
02167         }
02168 
02169         if (sharpCount) {
02170             avgSharpness /= sharpCount;
02171             if (avgSharpness > 1.0f) {
02172                 avgSharpness = 1.0f;
02173             }
02174         }
02175 
02176         if (seamEdges < 2 || seamEdges != v->numEdges)
02177             seam = 0;
02178 
02179         if (!v->numEdges) {
02180             VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
02181         }
02182         else if (_vert_isBoundary(v)) {
02183             int numBoundary = 0;
02184 
02185             VertDataZero(r);
02186             for (i = 0; i < v->numEdges; i++) {
02187                 CCGEdge *e = v->edges[i];
02188                 if (_edge_isBoundary(e)) {
02189                     VertDataAdd(r, VERT_getCo(_edge_getOtherVert(e, v), curLvl));
02190                     numBoundary++;
02191                 }
02192             }
02193             VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
02194             VertDataMulN(nCo, 0.75f);
02195             VertDataMulN(r, 0.25f / numBoundary);
02196             VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
02197         }
02198         else {
02199             int numEdges = 0, numFaces = 0;
02200 
02201             VertDataZero(q);
02202             for (i = 0; i < v->numFaces; i++) {
02203                 CCGFace *f = v->faces[i];
02204                 VertDataAdd(q, FACE_getCenterData(f));
02205                 numFaces++;
02206             }
02207             VertDataMulN(q, 1.0f / numFaces);
02208             VertDataZero(r);
02209             for (i = 0; i < v->numEdges; i++) {
02210                 CCGEdge *e = v->edges[i];
02211                 VertDataAdd(r, VERT_getCo(_edge_getOtherVert(e, v), curLvl));
02212                 numEdges++;
02213             }
02214             VertDataMulN(r, 1.0f / numEdges);
02215 
02216             VertDataCopy(nCo, co);
02217             VertDataMulN(nCo, numEdges - 2.0f);
