02218             VertDataAdd(nCo, q);
02219             VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
02220             VertDataMulN(nCo, 1.0f / numEdges);
02221         }
02222 
02223         if (sharpCount > 1 || seam) {
02224             VertDataZero(q);
02225 
02226             if (seam) {
02227                 avgSharpness = 1.0f;
02228                 sharpCount = seamEdges;
02229                 allSharp = 1;
02230             }
02231 
02232             for (i = 0; i < v->numEdges; i++) {
02233                 CCGEdge *e = v->edges[i];
02234                 float sharpness = EDGE_getSharpness(e, curLvl);
02235 
02236                 if (seam) {
02237                     if (_edge_isBoundary(e)) {
02238                         CCGVert *oV = _edge_getOtherVert(e, v);
02239                         VertDataAdd(q, VERT_getCo(oV, curLvl));
02240                     }
02241                 }
02242                 else if (sharpness != 0.0f) {
02243                     CCGVert *oV = _edge_getOtherVert(e, v);
02244                     VertDataAdd(q, VERT_getCo(oV, curLvl));
02245                 }
02246             }
02247 
02248             VertDataMulN(q, (float) 1 / sharpCount);
02249 
02250             if (sharpCount != 2 || allSharp) {
02251                 /* q = q + (co - q) * avgSharpness */
02252                 VertDataCopy(r, co);
02253                 VertDataSub(r, q);
02254                 VertDataMulN(r, avgSharpness);
02255                 VertDataAdd(q, r);
02256             }
02257 
02258             /* r = co * 0.75 + q * 0.25 */
02259             VertDataCopy(r, co);
02260             VertDataMulN(r, 0.75f);
02261             VertDataMulN(q, 0.25f);
02262             VertDataAdd(r, q);
02263 
02264             /* nCo = nCo  + (r - nCo) * avgSharpness */
02265             VertDataSub(r, nCo);
02266             VertDataMulN(r, avgSharpness);
02267             VertDataAdd(nCo, r);
02268         }
02269 
02270         // vert flags cleared later
02271     }
02272 
02273     if (ss->useAgeCounts) {
02274         for (i = 0; i < numEffectedV; i++) {
02275             CCGVert *v = effectedV[i];
02276             byte *userData = ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v);
02277             *((int *) &userData[ss->vertUserAgeOffset]) = ss->currentAge;
02278         }
02279 
02280         for (i = 0; i < numEffectedE; i++) {
02281             CCGEdge *e = effectedE[i];
02282             byte *userData = ccgSubSurf_getEdgeUserData(ss, e);
02283             *((int *) &userData[ss->edgeUserAgeOffset]) = ss->currentAge;
02284         }
02285 
02286         for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++) {
02287             CCGFace *f = effectedF[i];
02288             byte *userData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceUserData(ss, f);
02289             *((int *) &userData[ss->faceUserAgeOffset]) = ss->currentAge;
02290         }
02291     }
02292 
02293     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedE; i++) {
02294         CCGEdge *e = effectedE[i];
02295         VertDataCopy(EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, 0), VERT_getCo(e->v0, nextLvl));
02296         VertDataCopy(EDGE_getCo(e, nextLvl, 2), VERT_getCo(e->v1, nextLvl));
02297     }
02298     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++) {
02299         CCGFace *f = effectedF[i];
02300         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
02301             CCGEdge *e = FACE_getEdges(f)[S];
02302             CCGEdge *prevE = FACE_getEdges(f)[(S + f->numVerts - 1) % f->numVerts];
02303 
02304             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, 0, 0), FACE_getCenterData(f));
02305             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, 0), FACE_getCenterData(f));
02306             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, 1, 1), VERT_getCo(FACE_getVerts(f)[S], nextLvl));
02307             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIECo(f, nextLvl, S, 1), EDGE_getCo(FACE_getEdges(f)[S], nextLvl, 1));
02308 
02309             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, 1, 0), _edge_getCoVert(e, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], nextLvl, 1, vertDataSize));
02310             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, nextLvl, S, 0, 1), _edge_getCoVert(prevE, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], nextLvl, 1, vertDataSize));
02311         }
02312     }
02313 
02314     for (curLvl = 1; curLvl < subdivLevels; curLvl++) {
02315         ccgSubSurf__calcSubdivLevel(ss,
02316                                     effectedV, effectedE, effectedF,
02317                                     numEffectedV, numEffectedE, numEffectedF, curLvl);
02318     }
02319 
02320     if (ss->calcVertNormals)
02321         ccgSubSurf__calcVertNormals(ss,
02322                                     effectedV, effectedE, effectedF,
02323                                     numEffectedV, numEffectedE, numEffectedF);
02324 
02325     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedV; ptrIdx++) {
02326         CCGVert *v = effectedV[ptrIdx];
02327         v->flags = 0;
02328     }
02329     for (ptrIdx = 0; ptrIdx < numEffectedE; ptrIdx++) {
02330         CCGEdge *e = effectedE[ptrIdx];
02331         e->flags = 0;
02332     }
02333 
02334     MEM_freeN(effectedF);
02335     MEM_freeN(effectedE);
02336     MEM_freeN(effectedV);
02337 }
02338 
02339 static void ccgSubSurf__allFaces(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace ***faces, int *numFaces, int *freeFaces)
02340 {
02341     CCGFace **array;
02342     int i, num;
02343 
02344     if (!*faces) {
02345         array = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*array) * ss->fMap->numEntries, "CCGSubsurf allFaces");
02346         num = 0;
02347         for (i = 0; i < ss->fMap->curSize; i++) {
02348             CCGFace *f = (CCGFace *) ss->fMap->buckets[i];
02349 
02350             for (; f; f = f->next)
02351                 array[num++] = f;
02352         }
02353 
02354         *faces = array;
02355         *numFaces = num;
02356         *freeFaces = 1;
02357     }
02358     else {
02359         *freeFaces = 0;
02360     }
02361 }
02362 
02363 static void ccgSubSurf__effectedFaceNeighbours(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace **faces, int numFaces, CCGVert ***verts, int *numVerts, CCGEdge ***edges, int *numEdges)
02364 {
02365     CCGVert **arrayV;
02366     CCGEdge **arrayE;
02367     int numV, numE, i, j;
02368 
02369     arrayV = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*arrayV) * ss->vMap->numEntries, "CCGSubsurf arrayV");
02370     arrayE = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*arrayE) * ss->eMap->numEntries, "CCGSubsurf arrayV");
02371     numV = numE = 0;
02372 
02373     for (i = 0; i < numFaces; i++) {
02374         CCGFace *f = faces[i];
02375         f->flags |= Face_eEffected;
02376     }
02377 
02378     for (i = 0; i < ss->vMap->curSize; i++) {
02379         CCGVert *v = (CCGVert *) ss->vMap->buckets[i];
02380 
02381         for (; v; v = v->next) {
02382             for (j = 0; j < v->numFaces; j++)
02383                 if (!(v->faces[j]->flags & Face_eEffected))
02384                     break;
02385             
02386             if (j == v->numFaces) {
02387                 arrayV[numV++] = v;
02388                 v->flags |= Vert_eEffected;
02389             }
02390         }
02391     }
02392 
02393     for (i = 0; i < ss->eMap->curSize; i++) {
02394         CCGEdge *e = (CCGEdge *) ss->eMap->buckets[i];
02395 
02396         for (; e; e = e->next) {
02397             for (j = 0; j < e->numFaces; j++)
02398                 if (!(e->faces[j]->flags & Face_eEffected))
02399                     break;
02400             
02401             if (j == e->numFaces) {
02402                 e->flags |= Edge_eEffected;
02403                 arrayE[numE++] = e;
02404             }
02405         }
02406     }
02407 
02408     *verts = arrayV;
02409     *numVerts = numV;
02410     *edges = arrayE;
02411     *numEdges = numE;
02412 }
02413 
02414 /* copy face grid coordinates to other places */
02415 CCGError ccgSubSurf_updateFromFaces(CCGSubSurf *ss, int lvl, CCGFace **effectedF, int numEffectedF)
02416 {
02417     int i, S, x, gridSize, cornerIdx, subdivLevels;
02418     int vertDataSize = ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize, freeF;
02419 
02420     subdivLevels = ss->subdivLevels;
02421     lvl = (lvl) ? lvl : subdivLevels;
02422     gridSize = ccg_gridsize(lvl);
02423     cornerIdx = gridSize - 1;
02424 
02425     ccgSubSurf__allFaces(ss, &effectedF, &numEffectedF, &freeF);
02426 
02427     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++) {
02428         CCGFace *f = effectedF[i];
02429 
02430         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
02431             CCGEdge *e = FACE_getEdges(f)[S];
02432             CCGEdge *prevE = FACE_getEdges(f)[(S + f->numVerts - 1) % f->numVerts];
02433 
02434             VertDataCopy(FACE_getCenterData(f), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, 0, 0));
02435             VertDataCopy(VERT_getCo(FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, cornerIdx, cornerIdx));
02436 
02437             for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++)
02438                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, x), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, 0));
02439 
02440             for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++) {
02441                 int eI = gridSize - 1 - x;
02442                 VertDataCopy(_edge_getCoVert(e, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl, eI, vertDataSize), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, cornerIdx, x));
02443                 VertDataCopy(_edge_getCoVert(prevE, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl, eI, vertDataSize), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, cornerIdx));
02444             }
02445         }
02446     }
02447 
02448     if (freeF) MEM_freeN(effectedF);
02449 
02450     return eCCGError_None;
02451 }
02452 
02453 /* copy other places to face grid coordinates */
02454 CCGError ccgSubSurf_updateToFaces(CCGSubSurf *ss, int lvl, CCGFace **effectedF, int numEffectedF)
02455 {
02456     int i, S, x, gridSize, cornerIdx, subdivLevels;
02457     int vertDataSize = ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize, freeF;
02458 
02459     subdivLevels = ss->subdivLevels;
02460     lvl = (lvl) ? lvl : subdivLevels;
02461     gridSize = ccg_gridsize(lvl);
02462     cornerIdx = gridSize - 1;
02463 
02464     ccgSubSurf__allFaces(ss, &effectedF, &numEffectedF, &freeF);
02465 
02466     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++) {
02467         CCGFace *f = effectedF[i];
02468 
02469         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
02470             int prevS = (S + f->numVerts - 1) % f->numVerts;
02471             CCGEdge *e = FACE_getEdges(f)[S];
02472             CCGEdge *prevE = FACE_getEdges(f)[prevS];
02473 
02474             for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++) {
02475                 int eI = gridSize - 1 - x;
02476                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, cornerIdx, x), _edge_getCoVert(e, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl, eI, vertDataSize));
02477                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, cornerIdx), _edge_getCoVert(prevE, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl, eI, vertDataSize));
02478             }
02479 
02480             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
02481                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, 0, x), FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, prevS, x));
02482                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, 0), FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, x));
02483             }
02484 
02485             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, 0, 0), FACE_getCenterData(f));
02486             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, cornerIdx, cornerIdx), VERT_getCo(FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl));
02487         }
02488     }
02489 
02490     if (freeF) MEM_freeN(effectedF);
02491 
02492     return eCCGError_None;
02493 }
02494 
02495 /* stitch together face grids, averaging coordinates at edges
02496  * and vertices, for multires displacements */
02497 CCGError ccgSubSurf_stitchFaces(CCGSubSurf *ss, int lvl, CCGFace **effectedF, int numEffectedF)
02498 {
02499     CCGVert **effectedV;
02500     CCGEdge **effectedE;
02501     int numEffectedV, numEffectedE, freeF;
02502     int i, S, x, gridSize, cornerIdx, subdivLevels, edgeSize;
02503     int vertDataSize = ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize;
02504 
02505     subdivLevels = ss->subdivLevels;
02506     lvl = (lvl) ? lvl : subdivLevels;
02507     gridSize = ccg_gridsize(lvl);
02508     edgeSize = ccg_edgesize(lvl);
02509     cornerIdx = gridSize - 1;
02510 
02511     ccgSubSurf__allFaces(ss, &effectedF, &numEffectedF, &freeF);
02512     ccgSubSurf__effectedFaceNeighbours(ss, effectedF, numEffectedF,
02513                                        &effectedV, &numEffectedV, &effectedE, &numEffectedE);
02514 
02515     /* zero */
02516     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedV; i++) {
02517         CCGVert *v = effectedV[i];
02518         if (v->numFaces)
02519             VertDataZero(VERT_getCo(v, lvl));
02520     }
02521 
02522     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedE; i++) {
02523         CCGEdge *e = effectedE[i];
02524 
02525         if (e->numFaces)
02526             for (x = 0; x < edgeSize; x++)
02527                 VertDataZero(EDGE_getCo(e, lvl, x));
02528     }
02529 
02530     /* add */
02531     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++) {
02532         CCGFace *f = effectedF[i];
02533 
02534         VertDataZero(FACE_getCenterData(f));
02535 
02536         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++)
02537             for (x = 0; x < gridSize; x++)
02538                 VertDataZero(FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, x));
02539 
02540         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
02541             int prevS = (S + f->numVerts - 1) % f->numVerts;
02542             CCGEdge *e = FACE_getEdges(f)[S];
02543             CCGEdge *prevE = FACE_getEdges(f)[prevS];
02544 
02545             VertDataAdd(FACE_getCenterData(f), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, 0, 0));
02546             if (FACE_getVerts(f)[S]->flags & Vert_eEffected)
02547                 VertDataAdd(VERT_getCo(FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, cornerIdx, cornerIdx));
02548 
02549             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
02550                 VertDataAdd(FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, x), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, 0));
02551                 VertDataAdd(FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, prevS, x), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, 0, x));
02552             }
02553 
02554             for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
02555                 int eI = gridSize - 1 - x;
02556                 if (FACE_getEdges(f)[S]->flags & Edge_eEffected)
02557                     VertDataAdd(_edge_getCoVert(e, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl, eI, vertDataSize), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, cornerIdx, x));
02558                 if (FACE_getEdges(f)[prevS]->flags & Edge_eEffected)
02559                     if (x != 0)
02560                         VertDataAdd(_edge_getCoVert(prevE, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl, eI, vertDataSize), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, cornerIdx));
02561             }
02562         }
02563     }
02564 
02565     /* average */
02566     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedV; i++) {
02567         CCGVert *v = effectedV[i];
02568         if (v->numFaces)
02569             VertDataMulN(VERT_getCo(v, lvl), 1.0f / v->numFaces);
02570     }
02571 
02572     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedE; i++) {
02573         CCGEdge *e = effectedE[i];
02574 
02575         VertDataCopy(EDGE_getCo(e, lvl, 0), VERT_getCo(e->v0, lvl));
02576         VertDataCopy(EDGE_getCo(e, lvl, edgeSize - 1), VERT_getCo(e->v1, lvl));
02577 
02578         if (e->numFaces)
02579             for (x = 1; x < edgeSize - 1; x++)
02580                 VertDataMulN(EDGE_getCo(e, lvl, x), 1.0f / e->numFaces);
02581     }
02582 
02583     /* copy */
02584     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++) {
02585         CCGFace *f = effectedF[i];
02586 
02587         VertDataMulN(FACE_getCenterData(f), 1.0f / f->numVerts);
02588 
02589         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++)
02590             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++)
02591                 VertDataMulN(FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, x), 0.5f);
02592 
02593         for (S = 0; S < f->numVerts; S++) {
02594             int prevS = (S + f->numVerts - 1) % f->numVerts;
02595             CCGEdge *e = FACE_getEdges(f)[S];
02596             CCGEdge *prevE = FACE_getEdges(f)[prevS];
02597 
02598             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, 0, 0), FACE_getCenterData(f));
02599             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, cornerIdx, cornerIdx), VERT_getCo(FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl));
02600 
02601             for (x = 1; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
02602                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, 0), FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, x));
02603                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, 0, x), FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, prevS, x));
02604             }
02605 
02606             for (x = 0; x < gridSize - 1; x++) {
02607                 int eI = gridSize - 1 - x;
02608                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, cornerIdx, x), _edge_getCoVert(e, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl, eI, vertDataSize));
02609                 VertDataCopy(FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, x, cornerIdx), _edge_getCoVert(prevE, FACE_getVerts(f)[S], lvl, eI, vertDataSize));
02610             }
02611 
02612             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, 0), FACE_getCenterData(f));
02613             VertDataCopy(FACE_getIECo(f, lvl, S, gridSize - 1), FACE_getIFCo(f, lvl, S, gridSize - 1, 0));
02614         }
02615     }
02616 
02617     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedV; i++)
02618         effectedV[i]->flags = 0;
02619     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedE; i++)
02620         effectedE[i]->flags = 0;
02621     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++)
02622         effectedF[i]->flags = 0;
02623 
02624     MEM_freeN(effectedE);
02625     MEM_freeN(effectedV);
02626     if (freeF) MEM_freeN(effectedF);
02627 
02628     return eCCGError_None;
02629 }
02630 
02631 /* update normals for specified faces */
02632 CCGError ccgSubSurf_updateNormals(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace **effectedF, int numEffectedF)
02633 {
02634     CCGVert **effectedV;
02635     CCGEdge **effectedE;
02636     int i, numEffectedV, numEffectedE, freeF;
02637 
02638     ccgSubSurf__allFaces(ss, &effectedF, &numEffectedF, &freeF);
02639     ccgSubSurf__effectedFaceNeighbours(ss, effectedF, numEffectedF,
02640                                        &effectedV, &numEffectedV, &effectedE, &numEffectedE);
02641 
02642     if (ss->calcVertNormals)
02643         ccgSubSurf__calcVertNormals(ss,
02644                                     effectedV, effectedE, effectedF,
02645                                     numEffectedV, numEffectedE, numEffectedF);
02646 
02647     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedV; i++)
02648         effectedV[i]->flags = 0;
02649     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedE; i++)
02650         effectedE[i]->flags = 0;
02651     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++)
02652         effectedF[i]->flags = 0;
02653 
02654     MEM_freeN(effectedE);
02655     MEM_freeN(effectedV);
02656     if (freeF) MEM_freeN(effectedF);
02657 
02658     return eCCGError_None;
02659 }
02660 
02661 /* compute subdivision levels from a given starting point, used by
02662  * multires subdivide/propagate, by filling in coordinates at a
02663  * certain level, and then subdividing that up to the highest level */
02664 CCGError ccgSubSurf_updateLevels(CCGSubSurf *ss, int lvl, CCGFace **effectedF, int numEffectedF)
02665 {
02666     CCGVert **effectedV;
02667     CCGEdge **effectedE;
02668     int numEffectedV, numEffectedE, freeF, i;
02669     int curLvl, subdivLevels = ss->subdivLevels;
02670 
02671     ccgSubSurf__allFaces(ss, &effectedF, &numEffectedF, &freeF);
02672     ccgSubSurf__effectedFaceNeighbours(ss, effectedF, numEffectedF,
02673                                        &effectedV, &numEffectedV, &effectedE, &numEffectedE);
02674 
02675     for (curLvl = lvl; curLvl < subdivLevels; curLvl++) {
02676         ccgSubSurf__calcSubdivLevel(ss,
02677                                     effectedV, effectedE, effectedF,
02678                                     numEffectedV, numEffectedE, numEffectedF, curLvl);
02679     }
02680 
02681     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedV; i++)
02682         effectedV[i]->flags = 0;
02683     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedE; i++)
02684         effectedE[i]->flags = 0;
02685     for (i = 0; i < numEffectedF; i++)
02686         effectedF[i]->flags = 0;
02687 
02688     MEM_freeN(effectedE);
02689     MEM_freeN(effectedV);
02690     if (freeF) MEM_freeN(effectedF);
02691 
02692     return eCCGError_None;
02693 }
02694 
02695 #undef VERT_getCo
02696 #undef EDGE_getCo
02697 #undef FACE_getIECo
02698 #undef FACE_getIFCo
02699

02731 }

02733 {

02735 }

02737 {
02738     if (level < 1 || level > ss->subdivLevels) {

02740     }
02741     else {

02743     }
02744 }

02746 {

02750 {
02751     if (level < 1 || level > ss->subdivLevels) {
02752         return -1;
02753     }
02754     else {
02755         return ccg_gridsize(level);
02756     }

02759 /* Vert accessors */

02761 CCGVertHDL ccgSubSurf_getVertVertHandle(CCGVert *v)
02762 {
02763     return v->vHDL;
02764 }
02765 int ccgSubSurf_getVertAge(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGVert *v)
02766 {
02767     if (ss->useAgeCounts) {
02768         byte *userData = ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(ss, v);
02769         return ss->currentAge - *((int *) &userData[ss->vertUserAgeOffset]);
02770     }
02771     else {
02772         return 0;
02773     }
02774 }
02775 void *ccgSubSurf_getVertUserData(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGVert *v)
02776 {
02777     return VERT_getLevelData(v) + ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize * (ss->subdivLevels + 1);
02778 }

02780 {
02781     return v->numFaces;
02782 }

02784 {
02785     if (index < 0 || index >= v->numFaces) {
02786         return NULL;
02787     }
02788     else {
02789         return v->faces[index];
02790     }
02791 }
02792 int ccgSubSurf_getVertNumEdges(CCGVert *v)
02793 {
02794     return v->numEdges;
02795 }
02796 CCGEdge *ccgSubSurf_getVertEdge(CCGVert *v, int index)
02797 {
02798     if (index < 0 || index >= v->numEdges) {
02799         return NULL;
02800     }
02801     else {
02802         return v->edges[index];
02803     }
02804 }
02805 void *ccgSubSurf_getVertData(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGVert *v)
02806 {
02807     return ccgSubSurf_getVertLevelData(ss, v, ss->subdivLevels);
02808 }
02809 void *ccgSubSurf_getVertLevelData(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGVert *v, int level)
02810 {
02811     if (level < 0 || level > ss->subdivLevels) {
02812         return NULL;
02813     }
02814     else {
02815         return _vert_getCo(v, level, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize);
02816     }
02817 }

02886 {
02887     return f->fHDL;
02888 }
02889 int ccgSubSurf_getFaceAge(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace *f)
02890 {
02891     if (ss->useAgeCounts) {
02892         byte *userData = ccgSubSurf_getFaceUserData(ss, f);
02893         return ss->currentAge - *((int *) &userData[ss->faceUserAgeOffset]);
02894     }
02895     else {
02896         return 0;
02897     }
02898 }
02899 void *ccgSubSurf_getFaceUserData(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace *f)
02900 {
02901     int maxGridSize = ccg_gridsize(ss->subdivLevels);
02902     return FACE_getCenterData(f) + ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize * (1 + f->numVerts * maxGridSize + f->numVerts * maxGridSize * maxGridSize);
02903 }
02904 int ccgSubSurf_getFaceNumVerts(CCGFace *f)
02905 {
02906     return f->numVerts;
02907 }
02908 CCGVert *ccgSubSurf_getFaceVert(CCGFace *f, int index)
02909 {
02910     if (index < 0 || index >= f->numVerts) {
02911         return NULL;
02912     }
02913     else {
02914         return FACE_getVerts(f)[index];
02915     }
02916 }
02917 CCGEdge *ccgSubSurf_getFaceEdge(CCGFace *f, int index)
02918 {
02919     if (index < 0 || index >= f->numVerts) {
02920         return NULL;
02921     }
02922     else {
02923         return FACE_getEdges(f)[index];
02924     }
02925 }
02926 int ccgSubSurf_getFaceEdgeIndex(CCGFace *f, CCGEdge *e)
02927 {
02928     int i;
02929 
02930     for (i = 0; i < f->numVerts; i++) {
02931         if (FACE_getEdges(f)[i] == e) {
02932             return i;
02933         }
02934     }
02935     return -1;
02936 }
02937 void *ccgSubSurf_getFaceCenterData(CCGFace *f)
02938 {
02939     return FACE_getCenterData(f);
02940 }
02941 void *ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridEdgeDataArray(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace *f, int gridIndex)
02942 {
02943     return ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridEdgeData(ss, f, gridIndex, 0);
02944 }
02945 void *ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridEdgeData(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace *f, int gridIndex, int x)
02946 {
02947     return _face_getIECo(f, ss->subdivLevels, gridIndex, x, ss->subdivLevels, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize);
02948 }
02949 void *ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridDataArray(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace *f, int gridIndex)
02950 {
02951     return ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridData(ss, f, gridIndex, 0, 0);
02952 }
02953 void *ccgSubSurf_getFaceGridData(CCGSubSurf *ss, CCGFace *f, int gridIndex, int x, int y)
02954 {
02955     return _face_getIFCo(f, ss->subdivLevels, gridIndex, x, y, ss->subdivLevels, ss->meshIFC.vertDataSize);
02956 }

03023 
03024 /*** Extern API final vert/edge/face interface ***/
03025 
03026 int ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalVerts(const CCGSubSurf *ss)
03027 {
03028     int edgeSize = ccg_edgesize(ss->subdivLevels);
03029     int gridSize = ccg_gridsize(ss->subdivLevels);
03030     int numFinalVerts = (ss->vMap->numEntries +
03031                          ss->eMap->numEntries * (edgeSize - 2) +
03032                          ss->fMap->numEntries +
03033                          ss->numGrids * ((gridSize - 2) + ((gridSize - 2) * (gridSize - 2))));
03034 
03035     return numFinalVerts;
03036 }
03037 int ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalEdges(const CCGSubSurf *ss)
03038 {
03039     int edgeSize = ccg_edgesize(ss->subdivLevels);
03040     int gridSize = ccg_gridsize(ss->subdivLevels);
03041     int numFinalEdges = (ss->eMap->numEntries * (edgeSize - 1) +
03042                          ss->numGrids * ((gridSize - 1) + 2 * ((gridSize - 2) * (gridSize - 1))));
03043 
03044     return numFinalEdges;
03045 }
03046 int ccgSubSurf_getNumFinalFaces(const CCGSubSurf *ss)
03047 {
03048     int gridSize = ccg_gridsize(ss->subdivLevels);
03049     int numFinalFaces = ss->numGrids * ((gridSize - 1) * (gridSize - 1));
03050     return numFinalFaces;
03051 }
